tazribeaconofunity.name: Tazri, Beacon of Unity
tazribeaconofunity.rules_text:
This spell costs 1 less to cast for each creature in your party.

[2/U][2/B][2/R][2/G]: Look at the top six cards of your cards of your library, You may reveal up to two Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, Wizard, and/or Ally cards from among them and put them into the your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

jacemirrormage.name: Jace, Mirror Mage
jacemirrormage.rules_text:
Kicker 2

When Jace, Mirror Mage enters the battlefield, if Jace was kicked, create a token that's a copy of Jace, Mirror Mage, except it's not legendary and its starting loyalty is 1.

[+1]: Scry 2.

[0]: Draw a card and reveal it. Remove a number of loyalty counters equal to that card's converted mana cost from Jace, Mirror Mage.

dranathelastbloodchief.name: Drana, the Last Bloodchief
dranathelastbloodchief.rules_text:
Flying


Whenever Drana, the Last Bloodchief attacks, defending player chooses a nonlegendary creature card in your graveyard. You may return that card to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. That creature is a Vampire in addition to its other types.

moraugfuryofakoum.name: Moraug, Fury of Akoum
moraugfuryofakoum.rules_text:
Each creature you control gets +1/+0 for each time it has attacked this turn.

Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if it's your main phase, there's an additional combat phase after this phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all creatures you control.

ashayasoulofthewild.name: Ashaya, Soul of the Wild
ashayasoulofthewild.rules_text:
Ashaya, Soul of the Wild's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.

Nontoken creatures you control are Forest lands in addition to their other types. (They're still affected by summoning sickness.)

angelofdestiny.name: Angel of Destiny
angelofdestiny.rules_text:
Flying, double strike

Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you and that player each gain that much life.

At the beginning of your end step, if you have at least 15 life more than your starting life total, each player Angel of Destiny attacked this turn loses the game.

seagatestormcaller.name: Sea Gate Stormcaller
seagatestormcaller.rules_text:
Kicker 4U

When Sea Gate Stormcaller enters the battlefield, copy the next instant or sorcery spell with converted mana cost 2 or less you cast this turn when you cast it. If Sea Gate Stormcaller was kicked, copy that spell twice instead. You may choose new targets for the copies.

scourgeoftheskyclaves.name: Scourge of the Skyclaves
scourgeoftheskyclaves.rules_text:
Kicker 4B

When you cast this spell, if it was kicked, each player loses half their life, rounded up.

Scourge of the Skyclave's power and toughness are each equal to 20 minus the highest life total among players.

leylinetyrant.name: Leyline Tyrant
leylinetyrant.rules_text:
Flying

You don't lose unspent red mana as steps and phases end.

When Leyline Tyrant dies, you may pay any amount of R. When you do, it deals that much damage to any target.

ancientgreenwarden.name: Ancient Greenwarden
ancientgreenwarden.rules_text:
Reach


You may play lands from your graveyard.

If a land entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
ancientgreenwarden.flavor: When the ruins awakened, so did their defenses.

felidarretreat.name: Felidar Retreat
felidarretreat.rules_text:
Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one -

- Create a 2/2 white Cat Beast creature token.

- Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.

squadcommander.name: Squad Commander
squadcommander.rules_text:
When Squad Commander enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Kor Warrior creature token for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you have a full party, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn.

archonofemeria.name: Archon of Emeria
archonofemeria.rules_text:
Flying



Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.

Nonbasic lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

archpriestofiona.name: Archpriest of Iona
archpriestofiona.rules_text:
Archpriest of Iona's power is equal to the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you have a full party, target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.

legionangel.name: Legion Angel
legionangel.rules_text:
Flying

When Legion Angel enters the battlefield, you may reveal a card you own named Legion Angel from outside the game and put it into your hand.

luminarchaspirant.name: Luminarch Aspirant
luminarchaspirant.rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
luminarchaspirant.flavor: "Rally to my light, and together we will drive out this darkness!"

mauloftheskyclaves.name: Maul of the Skyclaves
mauloftheskyclaves.rules_text:
When Maul of the Skyclaves enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.

Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and first strike.

Equip 2WW

skyclaveapparition.name: Skyclave Apparition
skyclaveapparition.rules_text:
When Skyclave Apparition enters the battlefield, exile up to one target nonland permanent you don't control with converted mana cost 4 or less.

When Skyclave Apparition leaves the battlefield, the exiled card's owner creates an X/X blue Illusion creature token, where X is the converted mana cost of the exiled card.

alliedassault.name: Allied Assault
alliedassault.rules_text: Up to two target creatures each get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, Wizard.)
alliedassault.flavor: A common foe is the death of old hatreds.

canyonjerboa.name: Canyon Jerboa
canyonjerboa.rules_text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
canyonjerboa.flavor:
"Move, you wretched thing! You're scaring the hurdas!"

- Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada Nomad

journeytooblivion.name: Journey to Oblivion
journeytooblivion.rules_text:
This spell costs 1 less to cast for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Warrior.)

When Journey to Oblivion enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Journey to Oblivion leaves the battlefield.

attendedhealer.name: Attended Healer
attendedhealer.rules_text:
Whenever you gain life for the first time each turn, create a 1/1 white Cat creature token.

2W: Another target Cleric gains lifelink until end of turn.
attendedhealer.flavor: "My cats have taught me more about the sacred than anything in some old ruin."

emeriacaptain.name: Emerica Captain
emeriacaptain.rules_text:
Flying, vigilance


When Emeria Captain enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
emeriacaptain.flavor: "The gifts of the past must find their way into deserving hands."

fearlessfledgling.name: Fearless Fledgling
fearlessfledgling.rules_text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Fearless Fledgling. It gains flying until end of turn.
fearlessfledgling.flavor: Griffins nest in precarious places, so fledgings often find themselves taking their first flights at surprising moments.

kitesailcleric.name: Kitesail Cleric
kitesailcleric.rules_text:
Kicker 2W (You may pay an additional 2W as you cast this spell.)

Flying

When Kitesail Cleric enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, tap up to two target creatures.
kitesailcleric.flavor: Too flashy to ignore. Too fast to catch.

korblademaster.name: Kor Blademaster
korblademaster.rules_text:
Double Strike

Equipped Warriors you control have double strike.
korblademaster.flavor: Every kor blade is imbued with the skill of a thousand generations.

pairedtactician.name: Paired Tactician
pairedtactician.rules_text: Whenever Paired Tactician and at least one other Warrior attack, put a +1/+1 counter on Paired Tactician.
pairedtactician.flavor: "If we fight as one, nothing can stand in our way!"

pressurepoint.name: Pressure Point
pressurepoint.rules_text:
Tap target creature.

Draw a card.
pressurepoint.flavor: Poke a drake in the right place and it becomes as docile as a pet. Poke it in the wrong place and goodbye, hand.

expeditionhealer.name: Expedition Healer
expeditionhealer.rules_text:
Vigilance

Expedition Healer has lifelink as long as you control another Cleric.
expeditionhealer.flavor: In any adventuring party, the cleric is the heart: healing wounds, inspiring courage, and raising morale.

korcelebrant.name: Kor Celebrant
korcelebrant.rules_text: Whenever Kor Celebrant or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
korcelebrant.flavor: "The landbind ritual connects us to our sacred sites. More importantly, it binds us with every other kor who has visited here, through countless generations."

smitethemonstrous.name: Smite the Monstrous
smitethemonstrous.rules_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
smitethemonstrous.flavor:
"Darkness always flees from the light, and I am the breaking dawn."
-Kordain, luminarch of Kabira

angelheartprotector.name: Angelheart Protector
angelheartprotector.rules_text: When Angelheart Protector enters the battlefield, target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

cliffhavensellsword.name: Cliffhaven Sell-Sword
cliffhavensellsword.flavor: "I swing a sword. It's a simple life. A lot of adventurers just see me as some cheap muscle, but if my steel lets them return home with their lives and limbs intact, then I've done my job."

dauntlessunity.name: Dauntless Unity
dauntlessunity.rules_text:
Kicker 1W (You may pay an additional 1W as you cast this spell.)

Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, those creatures get +2/+1 until end of turn instead.

disenchant.name: Disenchant
disenchant.flavor: "From legend it was forged, and to legend it returns."

farsightadept.name: Farsight Adept
farsightadept.rules_text: When Farsight Adept enters the battlefield, you and target opponent each draw a card.
farsightadept.flavor: "I've walked every one of the Teetering Peaks and never set a foot wrong. I can get you to safety."

kabiraoutrider.name: Kabira Outrider
kabiraoutrider.rules_text: When Kabira Outrider enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
kabiraoutrider.flavor: Ondu moas make wildly uncomfortable mounts, but for determined warriors, their speed is enough to make up for it.

makindiox.name: Makindi Ox
makindiox.rules_text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

mesalynx.name: Mesa Lynx
mesalynx.rules_text: As long as it's not your turn, Mesa Lynx gets +0/+2.
mesalynx.flavor: Its ferocity is tempered by patience, knowing it must wait for just the right moment to strike a killing blow.

nahirisbinding.name: Nahiri's Binding
nahirisbinding.rules_text:
Enchant creautre or planeswalker


Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
nahirisbinding.flavor: "This is my world, Jace, down to its very bones."

practicedtactics.name: Practiced Tactics
practicedtactics.rules_text: Choose target attacking or blocking creature. Practiced Tactics deals damage to that creature equal to twice the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
practicedtactics.flavor: Each individual has their own crucial role to play.

prowlingfelidar.name: Prowling Felidar
prowlingfelidar.rules_text:
Vigilance

Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Prowling Felidar.
prowlingfelidar.flavor: On occasion, felidars leave meaty "gifts" outside the tents of explorers they consider worthy.

resolutestrike.name: Resolute Strike
resolutestrike.rules_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's a Warrior, you may attach an Equipment you control to it.
resolutestrike.flavor:
"If you practice something often enough, it becomes part of you. That's why we train, and that's why we survive." 
-Tasha, Graypelt veteran

seagatebanneret.name: Sea Gate Banneret
seagatebanneret.rules_text: 4W: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
seagatebanneret.flavor: The Sea Gate Expeditionary House was founded after the discovery of the Skyclave over Tazeem. Now its banners fly over every corner of Zendikar.

shepherdofheroes.name: Shepherd of Heroes
shepherdofheroes.rules_text:
Flying

When Shepherd of Heroes enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one of each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

tazeemraptor.name: Tazeem Raptor
tazeemraptor.rules_text:
Flying

When Tazeem raptor enters the battlefield, you may return a land you control to its owner's hand.
tazeemraptor.flavor:
"It's good to see the eagles circling the Lighthouse once again."
-Tazri

charixtheragingisle.name: Charix, Raging Isle
charixtheragingisle.rules_text:
Spells your opponents cast that target Charix, the Raging Isle cost 2 more to cast.


3: Charix gets +X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Islands you control.
charixtheragingisle.flavor: Zendikar's seas are deeper than anyone can fathom.

nimbletrapfinder.name: Nimble Trapfinder
nimbletrapfinder.rules_text:
Nimble Trapfinder can't be blocked if you had another Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, or Wizard enter the battlefield under your control this turn.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you have a full party, creatures you control gain "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card" until end of turn.

masterofwinds.name: Master of Winds
masterofwinds.rules_text:
Flying

When Master of Winds enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then discard a card.

Whenever you cast an instant, sorcery, or Wizard spell, you may have Master of Winds's base power and toughness become 4/1 or 1/4 until end of turn.

confoundingconundrum.name: Confounding Conundrum
confoundingconundrum.rules_text:
When Confounding Conundrum enters the battlefield, draw a card.

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, if that player had another land enter the battlefield under their control this turn, they return a land they control to its owner's hand.

coralhelmchronicler.name: Coralhelm Chronicler
coralhelmchronicler.rules_text:
Whenever you cast a kicked spell, draw a card, then discard a card.


When Coralhelm Chronicler enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a card with a kicker ability from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

inscriptionofinsight.name: Inscription of Insight
inscriptionofinsight.rules_text:
Kicker 2UU

Choose one. If this spell was kicked, choose any number instead.

* Return up to two target creatures to their owner's hands.

* Scry 2, then draw two cards.

* Target player creates an X/X blue Illusion creature token, where X is the number of cards in their hand.

maddeningcacophony.name: Maddening Cacophony
maddeningcacophony.rules_text:
Kicker 3U
	
Each opponent mills eight cards. If this spell was kicked, instead each opponent mills half their library, rounded up.
maddeningcacophony.flavor: Jace traced Nahiri to the Singing City, but the magic of the ancient ruins threatened to overwhelm his mind.

thievingskydiver.name: Thieving Skydiver
thievingskydiver.rules_text:
Kicker X (You may pay an additional X as you cast this spell.)


Flying

When Thieving Skydiver enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, gain conrol of target artifact with converted mana cost X or less. If that artifact is an Equipment, attach it to Thieving Skydiver.

roostofdrakes.name: Roost of Drakes
roostofdrakes.rules_text:
Kicker 2U

When Roost of Drakes enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.

Whenever you cast a kicked spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.

concerteddefense.name: Concerted Defense
concerteddefense.rules_text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays 1 plus an additional 1 for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
concerteddefense.flavor: "You mess with one of us, you mess with all of us!"

surefootedinfiltrator.name: Sure-Footed Infiltrator
surefootedinfiltrator.rules_text:
Tap another untapped Rogue you control: Sure-Footed Infiltrator can't be blocked this turn.

Whenever Sure-Footed Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

skyclaveplunder.name: Skyclave Plunder
skyclaveplunder.rules_text: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is 3 plus the number of creatures in your party. Put three of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

windriderwizard.name: Windreader Wizard
windriderwizard.rules_text:
Flying

Whenever you cast an instant, sorcery or Wizard spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
windriderwizard.flavor: "It's an ideal method for exploring sky ruins. The drakes sniff me briefly but then lose interest."

lullmagesdomination.name: Lulling Mage's Domination
lullmagesdomination.rules_text:
This spell costs 3 less to cast if it targets a creature whose controller has eight or more cards in their graveyard.


Gain control of target creature with converted mana cost X.
lullmagesdomination.flavor: "One spell to quiet the Roil, one to quash the will. The principle is the same."

merfolkwindrobber.name: Merfolk Windrobber
merfolkwindrobber.rules_text:
Flying


Whenever Merfolk Windrobber deals combat damage to a player, that player mills a card. (They put the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

Sacrifice Merfolk Windrobber: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard.

ruincrab.name: Ruin Crab
ruincrab.rules_text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent mills three cards. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
ruincrab.flavor: To an explorer, a priceless treasure. To the crab, a rock to call home.

chillingtrap.name: Chilling Trap
chillingtrap.rules_text: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. If you control a wizard, draw a card.
chillingtrap.flavor:
"Serves you right for rushing ahead."
-Kaliea, Sea Gate  trapfinder

tazeemroilmage.name: Tazeem Roilmage
tazeemroilmage.rules_text:
Kicker 4 (You may pay an additional 4 as you cast this spell.)

When Tazeem Roilmage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

skyclavesquid.name: Skyclave Squid
skyclavesquid.rules_text:
Defender


Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Skyclave Squid can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
skyclavesquid.flavor: An ancient sea monster dragged the Murasa Skyclave under the waves, then smaller sea monsters moved in.

deliberate.name: Deliberate
deliberate.flavor: "I can't see all that the future holds, but I can keep us one step ahead of death."

anticognition.name: Anticognition
anticognition.rules_text: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell unless its controller pays 2. If an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard, instead counter that spell, then scry 2.

bubblesnare.name: Bubble Snare
bubblesnare.rules_text:
Kicker 2U (You may pay an additional 2U as you cast this spell.)

Enchant creature

When Bubble Snare enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, tap enchanted creature.

Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

cascadeseer.name: Cascade Seer
cascadeseer.rules_text: When Cascade Seer enters the battlefield, scry X, where X is the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
cascadeseer.flavor: "Perhaps you can't see the path, but that doesn't mean it isn't there."

clericofchilldepths.name: Cleric of Chill Depths
clericofchilldepths.rules_text: When Cleric of Chill Depths blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
clericofchilldepths.flavor: "Before my people turned to false gods, we built a glittering city beneath the northern sea ice. The magic of ancient Benthdrix lives in me!"

cunninggeysermage.name: Cunning Geysermage
cunninggeysermage.rules_text:
Kicker 2U (You may pay an additional 2U as you cast this spell.)


When Cunning Geysermage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return up to one other target creature to its owner's hand.
cunninggeysermage.flavor: "Come on, Skitch, we'll lose them in the geyserfield."

expeditiondiviner.name: Expedition Diviner
expeditiondiviner.rules_text:
Flying


As long as you control another Wizard, Expedition Diviner has "When this creature dies, draw a card."
expeditiondiviner.flavor: Wizard's spell twist the fabric of reality to channel elemental energies, peer into the future, and even calm the Roil.

fieldresearch.name: Field Research
fieldresearch.rules_text:
Kicker 2U (You may pay an additional 2U as you cast this spell.)

Draw two cards. If this spell was kicked, draw three cards instead.
fieldresearch.flavor: "In the field, speed-reading is a survival skill."

glacialgrasp.name: Glacial Grasp
glacialgrasp.rules_text:
Tap target creature. Its controller mills two cards. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)

Draw a card.

intotheroil.name: Into the Roil
intotheroil.rules_text:
Kicker 1U (You may pay an additional 1U as you cast this spell.)

Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.
intotheroil.flavor: In theory, the death of the Eldrazi should have stilled the Roil. It did not.

livingtempest.name: Living Tempest
livingtempest.flavor:
"I you don't like the weather, just wait a few minutes and it'll change...probably for the worse."
-Amandi, kitesail expert

merfolkfalconer.name: Merfolk Falconer
merfolkfalconer.rules_text:
Flying

Whenever you cast a kicked spell, scry 2.
merfolkfalconer.flavor: "For generations, we have bred and trained falcons for expeditions into Emeria. Now more sky ruins open themselves to those with the means to reach the heights!"

negate.name: Negate
negate.flavor: "The ancient kor were a clever bunch with a taste for nasty traps. Spikes, poison, fire pouring forth with no warning...I've seen and disabled them all. If you intend to raid a Skyclave, you'd be wise to hire me on."

risenriptide.name: Risen Riptide
risenriptide.rules_text: Whenever you cast a kicked spell, Risen Riptide has base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.
risenriptide.flavor:
"Most days the sea is my friend. But only most days."
-Jori En, expedition leader

seafloorstalker.name: Seafloor Stalker
seafloorstalker.rules_text: 4U: Seafloor Stalker gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. This ability costs 1 less to activate for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one of each Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

shellshield.name: Shell Shield
shellshield.rules_text:
Kicker 1 (You may pay an additional 1 as you cast this spell.) 

Target creature you control gets +0/+3 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature also gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

zulaportduelist.name: Zulaport Duelist
zulaportduelist.rules_text:
Flash


When Zulaport Duelist enters the battlefield, up to one target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn. Its controller mills two cards. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)

nullpriestofoblivion.name: Nullpriest of Oblivion
nullpriestofoblivion.rules_text:
Kicker 3B

Menace, lifelink

When Nullpriest of Oblivion enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

shadowsverdict.name: Shadow's Verdict
shadowsverdict.rules_text: Exile all creatures and planeswalkers with converted mana cost 3 or less from the battlefield and all creature and planeswalker cards with converted mana cost 3 or less from all graveyards.
shadowsverdict.flavor: The shadows of death fall over everyone in the end.

skyclaveshade.name: Skyclave Shade
skyclaveshade.rules_text:
Kicker 2B

Skyclave Shade can't block.

If Skyclave Shade was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if Skyclave Shade is in your graveyard and it's your turn, you may cast it from your graveyard this turn.

inscriptionofruin.name: Inscription of Ruin
inscriptionofruin.rules_text:
Kicker 2BB

Choose one. If this spell was kicked, choose any number instead.

- Target opponent discards two cards.

- Return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

- Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less.

covetedprize.name: Coveted Prize
covetedprize.rules_text:
This spell costs 1 less to cast for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. If you have a full party, you may cast a spell with converted mana cost 4 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

nighthawkscavenger.name: Nighthawk Scavenger
nighthawkscavenger.rules_text:
Flying, deathtouch, lifelink

Nighthawk Scavenger's power is equal to 1 plus the number of card types among cards in your opponents' graveyards.

soulshatter.name: Soul Shatter
soulshatter.rules_text: Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker with the highest converted mana cost among creatures and planeswalkers they control.
soulshatter.flavor: The Kargan tribes share legends of the victory their ancestors won over the Akoum Skyclave, and its horrendous cost.

taboraxhopesdemise.name: Tabarax, Hope's Demise
taboraxhopesdemise.rules_text:
Flying


Taborax, Hope's Demise has lifelink as long as it has five or more +1/+1 counters on it.

Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Taborax. If that creature was a Cleric, you may draw a card. If you do, you lose 1 life.

scionoftheswarm.name: Scion of the Swarm
scionoftheswarm.rules_text:
Flying

Whenever you gain life. put a +1/+1 counter on Scion of the Swarm.
scionoftheswarm.flavor: Vampires are now masters of their own fates, commanders of their own legions.

shadowstinger.name: Shadow Stinger
shadowstinger.rules_text:
Tap another untapped Rogue you control: Shadow Stinger gains deathtouch until end of turn.


Whenever Shadow Stinger deals combat damage to a player, that player mills three cards. (They put the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.)

demonsdisciple.name: Demon's Disciple
demonsdisciple.rules_text: When Demon's Disciple enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.
demonsdisciple.flavor: Taborax's cultists are the latest in a long history of beings who have desired to see Zendikar torn to pieces.

lithoformblight.name: Lithoform Blight
lithoformblight.rules_text:
Enchant land


When Lithoform Blight enters the battlefield, draw a card.

Enchanted land loses all land types and abilities and has "T: Add ◊" and "T, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color."
lithoformblight.flavor: Heedless of Nissa's warnings, Nahiri repeated history.

mindcarver.name: Mind Carver
mindcarver.rules_text:
When Mind Carver enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.

Equipped creature gets +1/+0. It gets +3/+1 instead as long as an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard.

Equip 2B

skyclaveshadowcat.name: Skyclave Shadowcat
skyclaveshadowcat.rules_text:
1B, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Skyclave Shadowcat.

Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, draw a card.
skyclaveshadowcat.flavor:
"Perhaps its distant ancestors were radiant felidars, but no hint of their nobility remains."
-Akiri, kor line-slinger

thwartthegrave.name: Thwart the Grave
thwartthegrave.rules_text:
This spell costs 1 less to cast for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

Return target creature card and up to one target Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, or Wizard creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

acquisitionsexpert.name: Acquisitions Expert
acquisitionsexpert.rules_text: When Acquisitions Expert enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals a number of cards from their hand equal to the number of creatures of your party. You choose one of those cards. That player discards that card. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

bloodchiefsthirst.name: Bloodchief's Thirst
bloodchiefsthirst.rules_text:
Kicker 2B (You may pay an additional 2B as you cast this spell.)

Destroy target creature or planeswalker with converted mana cost 2 or less. If this spell was kicked, destroy target creature or planeswalker.
bloodchiefsthirst.flavor: "We are free. It is our duty to live well."

vanquishtheweak.name: Vanquish the Weak
vanquishtheweak.rules_text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.
vanquishtheweak.flavor: Open conflict between expeditionary houses - or even individual adventuring parties - is discouraged, but "accidents" happen.

bloodprice.name: Blood Price
bloodprice.rules_text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. You lose 2 life.

maraudingblightpriest.name: Maruading Blight-Priest
maraudingblightpriest.rules_text: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.
maraudingblightpriest.flavor: "The vampires never had gods. We followed our bloodchiefs. Now they are gone. What is left? Destruction and death, my friends. That is enough."

nimanaskydancer.name: Nimana Skydancer
nimanaskydancer.rules_text:
Flash

Flying

When Nimana Skydancer enters the battlefield, target opponent mills two cards. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)
nimanaskydancer.flavor: The Free City of Nimana is a great place to recruit adventurers with shady skill sets.

ghastlygloomhunter.name: Ghastly Gloomhunter
ghastlygloomhunter.rules_text:
Kicker 3B

Flying, lifelink

if Ghastly Gloomhunter was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

dranassilencer.name: Drana's Silencer
dranassilencer.rules_text: When Drana's Silencer enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Warrior.)

dreadwurm.name: Dreadwurm
dreadwurm.rules_text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Dreadwurm gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
dreadwurm.flavor: Its silent slithering belies its bulk.

malakirbloodpriest.name: Malakir Blood-Priest
malakirbloodpriest.rules_text: When Malakir Blood-Priest enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

minddrain.name: Mind Drain
minddrain.rules_text: Target opponent discards two cards, mills a card, and loses 1 life. You gain 1 life. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
minddrain.flavor: "The meal was exquisite. The conversation, less so."

nimanaskittersneak.name: Nimana Skitter-Sneak
nimanaskittersneak.rules_text: As long as an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard, Nimana Skitter-Sneak gets +1/+0 and has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
nimanaskittersneak.flavor: "When navigating dangerous terrain, one hundred legs are better than two."

bloodbeckoning.name: Blood Beckoning
bloodbeckoning.rules_text:
Kicker 3 (You may pay an additional 3 as you cast this spell.)



Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If this spell was kicked, instead return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

feedtheswarm.name: Feed the Swarm
feedtheswarm.rules_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's converted mana cost.
feedtheswarm.flavor:
"On vile wings and bloody wind, the swarm will rise."

- Skyclave inscription

highbornvampire.name: Highborn Vampire
highbornvampire.flavor: With the bloodchiefs annihilated in the fight between the free and enthralled, the swamps around Malakir are full of dangerous, young vampires eager to make their marks.

deadlyalliance.name: Deadly Alliance
deadlyalliance.rules_text:
This spell costs 1 less to cast for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
deadlyalliance.flavor: "He could handle any one of us, but he's no match for all of us."

expeditionskulker.name: Expedition Skulker
expeditionskulker.rules_text: Expedition Skulker has deathtouch as long as you control another Rogue.
expeditionskulker.flavor: Rogues bring an array of usefull skills to the work of an adventuring party: stealth, agility, the ability to locate and disarm traps, and a subtle, deadly fighting style.

subtlestrike.name: Subtle Strike
subtlestrike.rules_text:
Choose one or both - 


*Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. 

*Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
subtlestrike.flavor: Silence is an underrated hunting strategy.

oblivionshunger.name: Oblivion's Hunger
oblivionshunger.rules_text: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. Draw a card if that creature has +1/+1 counter on it. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy the creature.)
oblivionshunger.flavor:
"Indulge the void. Become the void. Consume all you touch."
-Drana, the last bloodchief

hagraconstrictor.name: Hagra Constrictor
hagraconstrictor.rules_text:
Hagra Constrictor enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.


Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has menace. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

guuldrazmucklord.name: Guul Draz Mucklord
guuldrazmucklord.rules_text: When Muuk Draz Mucklorrd dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
guuldrazmucklord.flavor: Death comes in many forms on Guul Draz, most of them slow, subtle, and agonizing. At least a monstrous crocodile offers a swift death.

shatterskullcharger.name: Shatterskull Charger
shatterskullcharger.rules_text:
Kicker 2


Trample, haste

If Shatterskull Charger was kicked, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter.


At the beginning of the end phase, if Shatterskull Charger doesn't have a +1/+1 counter on it, return it to its owner's hand.

nahirislithoforming.name: Nahiri's Lithoforming
nahirislithoforming.rules_text: Sacrifice X lands. For each land sacrificed this way, draw a card. You may play X additional lands this turn. Lands you control enter the battlefield tapped this turn.

waywardguidebeast.name: Wayward Guide-Beast
waywardguidebeast.rules_text:
Trample, haste

Whenever Wayward Guide-Beast deals combat damage to a player, return a land you control to its owner's hand.

magmaticchanneler.name: Magmatic Channeler
magmaticchanneler.rules_text:
As long as there are four or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Magmatic Channeler gets +3/+1.

T, Discard a card: Exile the top two cards of your library, then choose one of them. You may play that card this turn.

karganintimidator.name: Kargan Intimidator
karganintimidator.rules_text:
Cowards can't block Warriors.

1: Choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn -

* Kargan Intimidator gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

* Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn.

* Target Warrior gains trample until end of turn.

valakutexploration.name: Valakut Exploration
valakutexploration.rules_text:
Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled.

At the beginning of your end step, if there are cards exiled with Valakut Exploration, put them into their owner's graveyard, then Valakut Exploration deals that much damage to each opponent.

relicrobber.name: Relic Robber
relicrobber.rules_text:
Haste

Whenever Relic Robber deals combat damage to a player, that player creates a 0/1 colorless Goblin Construct artifact creature token with "This creature can't block" and "At the beginning of your upkeep, this creature deals 1 damage to you."

roilingvortex.name: Roiling Vortex
roilingvortex.rules_text:
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Roiling Vortex deals 1 damage to them.


Whenever a player casts a spell, if no mana was spent to cast that spell, Roiling Vortex deals 5 damage to that player.

R: Your opponents can't gain life this turn.

shatterskullminotaur.name: Shatterskull Minotaur
shatterskullminotaur.rules_text:
This spell costs 1 less to cast for each creature in your party. 


Haste
shatterskullminotaur.flavor: "We just pay him and point him at problems."

thunderingsparkmage.name: Thundering Sparkmage
thunderingsparkmage.rules_text: When Thundering Sparkmage enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker, where X is the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

firebladecharger.name: Fireblade Charger
firebladecharger.rules_text:
As long as Fireblade Charger is equipped, it has haste.

When Fireblade Charger dies, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.
firebladecharger.flavor: "Down in flames" isn't a destination, but a journey.

thunderingrebuke.name: Thundering Rebuke
thunderingrebuke.rules_text: Thundering Rebuke deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
thunderingrebuke.flavor:
"Fire is too imprecise for my tastes. I'd rather rely on a single, well-placed bolt of lightning."
-Lyrus, Sea Gate Wizard

cinderclasm.name: Cinderplasm
cinderclasm.rules_text:
Kicker R (You may pay an additional R as you cast this spell.)

Cinderplasm deals 1 damage to each creature. If it was kicked, it deals 2 damage to each creature instead.
cinderclasm.flavor: Every inferno begins with a spark.

rockslidesorcerer.name: Rockslide Sorcerer
rockslidesorcerer.rules_text: Whenever you cast an instant, sorcery, or Wizard spell, Rockslide Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target.
rockslidesorcerer.flavor: "You can cower from the crushing shards or embrace the danger of Akoum. I've made my choice."

skyclavegeopede.name: Skyclave Geopede
skyclavegeopede.rules_text:
Trample


Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Skyclave Geopede gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
skyclavegeopede.flavor: Wrenched from the ground like a dirt-caked rock, the ancient Skyclave wriggled with life.

gomafadavanguard.name: Goma Fada Vanguard
gomafadavanguard.rules_text: Whenever Goma Fada Vanguard attacks, target creature an opponent controls with power less than or equal to the number of Warriors you control can't block this turn.
gomafadavanguard.flavor:
"Her weapon's impressive, sure. But you should see her wield it."

- Gred, expedition warrior

grotagnightrunner.name: Grotag Night-Runner
grotagnightrunner.rules_text: Whenever Grotag Night-Runner deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.
grotagnightrunner.flavor: Naturally inquisitive and adaptable, goblins can turn their small stature to their advantage as rogues.

pyroclastichellion.name: Pyroclastic Hellion
pyroclastichellion.rules_text: When Pyroclastic Hellion enters the battlefield, you may return a land you control to its owner's hand. When you do, Pyroclastic Hellion Hellion deals 2 damage to each opponent.
pyroclastichellion.flavor:
"The difference between a hellion and a volcano is that volcanoes don't get hungry."
-Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

sizzlingbarrage.name: Sizzling Barrage
sizzlingbarrage.rules_text: Sizzling Barrage deals 4 damage to target creature that blocked this turn.
sizzlingbarrage.flavor:
"A thousand sparks can burn through your defenses just as quickly as one massive blaze."

- Attikar, Akoum elementalist

scavengedblade.name: Scavenged Blade
scavengedblade.rules_text:
When Scavenged Blade enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.

Equipped creature gets +2/+0.

Equip 2R (2R: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

moltenblast.name: Molten Blast
moltenblast.rules_text:
Choose one - 

- Molten Blast deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

- Destroy target artifact.
moltenblast.flavor: Life among the sudden tremors and violent eruptions of Akoum demands a healthy fear of both.

inordinaterage.name: Inordinate Rage
inordinaterage.rules_text: Target creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn. Scry 1.
inordinaterage.flavor:
"In my years wandering this land I've seen a vertible menagerie of fantastic creatures, but one that has eluded me thus far is the fabled 'easygoing minotaur.'"
-Ko, expedition wizard

scorchrider.name: Scorch Rider
scorchrider.rules_text:
Kicker 1R (You may pay an additional 1R as you cast this spell.)

When Scorch Rider enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, it gains haste until end of turn.
scorchrider.flavor: "Lava flows where it pleases. I'm just happy to be along for the ride!"

expeditionchampion.name: Expedition Champion
expeditionchampion.rules_text: Expedition Champion gets +2/+0 as long as you control another Warrior.
expeditionchampion.flavor: Warriors are combat specialists who bring their deadly skills to bear against the many foes that adventurers face in the course of their journeys.

roileruption.name: Roil Eruption
roileruption.rules_text:
Kicker 5 (You may pay an additional 5 as you cast this spell.)

Roil Eruption deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, it deals 5 damage instead.
roileruption.flavor:
"Our feeble villages and tiny encampments stand only at the whim of the Roil."

- The Invokers' Tales

fissurewizard.name: Fissure Wizard
fissurewizard.rules_text: When Fissure Wizard enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. if you do, draw a card.
fissurewizard.flavor: He might call up a burst of lava or a raging hellion from Akoum's volcanic depths. Or he might just fall in.

ardentelectromancer.name: Ardent Electromancer
ardentelectromancer.rules_text: When Ardent Electromancer enters the battlefield, add R for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, wand Wizard.)

cleansingwildfire.name: Cleansing Wildfire
cleansingwildfire.rules_text:
Destroy target land. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle their library.

Draw a card.

tormentingvoice.name: Tormenting Voice
tormentingvoice.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
tormentingvoice.flavor: Kargan tribal lands rarely have issues with goblin raids. Coincidentally, they also rarely have issues keeping their dragons fed.

teeterpeakambusher.name: Teeterpeak Ambusher
teeterpeakambusher.rules_text: 2R: Teeterpeak Ambusher gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
teeterpeakambusher.flavor: Goblins from the Makindi Trenches of Ondu make surprisingly skilled climbing guides due to their habit of scaling cliffs to drop onto unsuspecting foes.

tuktukrubblefort.name: Tuktuk Rubblefort
tuktukrubblefort.rules_text:
Defender, reach


Creatures you control have haste.
tuktukrubblefort.flavor: As with everything else, goblins believe fortifications benefit from as many spiky bits as possible.

sneakingguide.name: Sneaking Guide
sneakingguide.rules_text: 2, T: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

synchronizedspellcraft.name: Synchronized Spellcraft
synchronizedspellcraft.rules_text: Synchronized Spellcraft deals 4 damage to target creature and X damage to that creature's controller, where X is equal to the number of creatures in your party. (Your party consists ip to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

akoumhellhound.name: Akoum Hellhound
akoumhellhound.rules_text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Akoum Hellhound gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
akoumhellhound.flavor: Hellhound packs roam the Spikefields, basking in the harsh sunlight and lightning the night with their flames.

grotagbugcatcher.name: Grotag Bug-Catcher
grotagbugcatcher.rules_text:
Trample


Whenever Grotag Bug-Catcher attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

spitfirelagac.name: Spitfire Lagac
spitfirelagac.rules_text: Landfall  - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Spitfire Lagac deals 1 damage to each opponent.
spitfirelagac.flavor:
"If you hear a choking sort of cough, it's about to get really hot."
-Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter

oranriefooze.name: Oran-Rief Ooze
oranriefooze.rules_text:
When Oran-Rief Ooze enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

Whenever Oran-Rief ooze attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.

scuteswarm.name: Scute Swarm
scuteswarm.rules_text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token. If you control six or more lands, create a token that's a copy of Scute Swarm instead.
scuteswarm.flavor:
"Survival rule 782: There are always more scute bugs."
-Zurdi, goblin shortcutter

cragplatebaloth.name: Cragplate Baloth
cragplatebaloth.rules_text:
Kicker 2G

	Cragplate Baloth can't be countered.
	Hexproof, haste
	
	If Cragplate Baloth was kicked, it enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it..

inscriptionofabundance.name: Inscription of Abundance
inscriptionofabundance.rules_text:
Kicker 2G

Choose one. If this spell was kicked, choose any number instead.

- Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.

- Target player gains X life, where X is the greatest power among creatures they control.

- Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.

tajuruparagon.name: Tajuru Paragon
tajuruparagon.rules_text:
Tajuru Paragon is also a Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.


Kicker 3

When Tajuru Paragon enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, reveal the top six cards of your library. You may put a card that shares a creature type with it from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

lotuscobra.name: Lotus Cobra
lotuscobra.rules_text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may add one mana of any color.
lotuscobra.flavor: Its hood blossoms as a warning: receive your gift, but stray no closer.

swarmshambler.name: Swarm Shambler
swarmshambler.rules_text:
Swarm Shambler enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it becomes the target of a spell an opponent controls, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.

1, T: Put a +1/+1 counter on Swarm Shambler.

springmantlecleric.name: Springmantle Cleric
springmantlecleric.rules_text: Springmantle Cleric enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.
springmantlecleric.flavor: Hope and courage bloom in her wake.

murasasproutling.name: Murasa Sproutling
murasasproutling.rules_text:
Kicker 1G (You may pay an additional 1G as you cast this spell.)

When Murasa Sproutling enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return target card with a kicker ability from your graveyard to your hand.
murasasproutling.flavor: The seeds of memory grow eternal.

iridescenthornbeetle.name: Iridescent Hornbeetle
iridescenthornbeetle.rules_text: At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 Insect creature token for each +1/+1 counter you've put on creatures under your control this turn.
iridescenthornbeetle.flavor: The hatchlings will fill the jungles of Murasa in a glittering tide.

roilingregrowth.name: Roiling Regrowth
roilingregrowth.rules_text: Sacrifice a land. Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
roilingregrowth.flavor:
"Roots find their way through rock, and even mountains must give way to new growth."
-Nissa Revane

tauntingarbormage.name: Taunting Arbormage
tauntingarbormage.rules_text:
Kicker 3 (You may pay an additonial 3 as you cast this spell.)

When Taunting Arbormage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, all creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.

vastwoodsurge.name: Vastwood Surge
vastwoodsurge.rules_text:
Kicker 4 (You may pay an additional 4 as you cast this spell.)

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. If this spell was kicked, put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

veteranadventurer.name: Veteran Adventurer
veteranadventurer.rules_text:
Veteran Adventurer is also a Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.

This spell costs 1 less to cast for each creature in your party.

Vigilance

vinegecko.name: Vine Gecko
vinegecko.rules_text:
The first kicked spell you cast each turn costs 1 less to cast.

 Whenever you cast a kicked spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Vine Gecko.
vinegecko.flavor:
"It's cute now, but those things tend to get a lot bigger when you're not looking."
-Fahar, expedition wizard

adventureawaits.name: Adventure Awaits
adventureawaits.rules_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. If you didn't put a card into your hand this way, draw a card.
adventureawaits.flavor: "Good, we're all here. Let's get started!"

brokenwings.name: Broken Wings
brokenwings.rules_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
brokenwings.flavor: Getting airborne with a kitesail is easy. It's everything afterward that takes focus, skill, and luck.

canopybaloth.name: Canopy Baloth
canopybaloth.rules_text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Canopy Baloth gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
canopybaloth.flavor:
"You can almost see it calculating-are we a tasty enough treat to risk the jump."
-Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

dauntlesssurvivor.name: Dauntless Survivor
dauntlesssurvivor.rules_text: When Dauntless Survivor enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
dauntlesssurvivor.flavor: "I've got a little surprise for you, beasties! Come and get it!"

gnarlidcolony.name: Gnarlid Colony
gnarlidcolony.rules_text:
Kicker 2G (You may pay an additional 2G as you cast this spell.)

If Gnarlid Colony was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
gnarlidcolony.flavor: Where mana flows, the gnarlids follow.

joragavisionary.name: Joraga Visionary
joragavisionary.rules_text: When Joraga Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.
joragavisionary.flavor: "If you only follow where the paths lead, you merely go where others have gone before you."

kazandunectarpot.name: Kazandu Nectarpot
kazandunectarpot.rules_text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
kazandunectarpot.flavor:
"The scythe-like forelegs are crucial for its survival, because it tastes really good and every inhabitant of Murasa knows it."
-Arhana, Kazandu trapfinder

kazandustomper.name: Kazandu Stomper
kazandustomper.rules_text:
Trample


When Kazandu Stomper enters the battlefield, return up to two lands you control to their owner's hand.
kazandustomper.flavor: Elves revere cycles of renewal, but they prefer cycles that don't involve their homes getting smashed.

mightofmurasa.name: Might of Murasa
mightofmurasa.rules_text:
Kicker 2G (You may pay an additional 2G as you cast this spell.)

Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead.
mightofmurasa.flavor: The continent of Murasa is defined by irrepressible growth, both natural and otherwise.

murasabrute.name: Murasa Brute
murasabrute.flavor: Some adventuring parties are made up of old friends, their common bonds bolstering them in the face of peril. Other parties simply hire the biggest, meanest muscle they can find.

nissaszendikon.name: Nissa's Zendikon
nissaszendikon.rules_text:
Enchant land

Enchanted land is a 4/4 Elemental creature with reach and haste. It's still a land.

When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

rabidbite.name: Rabid Bite
rabidbite.rules_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
rabidbite.flavor: A healthy felidar is voracious yet regal. A rabid felidar is nothing more than appetite lashed to frothing jaws.

reclaimthewastes.name: Reclaim the Wastes
reclaimthewastes.rules_text:
Kicker 3 (You may pay an additional 3 as you cast this spell.)

Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. If this spell was kicked, search your library for two basic land cards instead of one.

scaletheheights.name: Scale the Heights
scaletheheights.rules_text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. You gain 2 life. You may play an additional land this turn.

Draw a card.

skyclavepickaxe.name: Skyclave Pick-Axe
skyclavepickaxe.rules_text:
When Skyclave Pick-Axe enters the battlefield under your control, attach it to target creature you control.

Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

Equip 2G
skyclavepickaxe.flavor: For use on cliffs and other faces.
