When valkyrie's Sword enters the battlefield, you may pay 4W. If you do, create a 4/4 white Angel Warrior creature token with flying and vigilance, then attach Valkyrie's Sword to it.

Equipped creature gets +2/+1.

Equip 3.

divinegambit.name: Divine Gambit
divinegambit.rules_text: Exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment an opponent controls. That player may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield.
divinegambit.flavor: There are rules, and then there are gods.

kayasonslaught.name: Kaya's Onslaught
kayasonslaught.rules_text:
Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn.


Foretell W (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its fortell cost.)

spectralsteel.name: Spectral Steel
spectralsteel.rules_text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2
	1W, Exile Spectral Steel from your graveyard: Return another target Aura or Equipment card from your graveyard to your hand.

valoroftheworthy.name: Valor of the Worthy
valoroftheworthy.rules_text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

When enchanted creature leaves the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
valoroftheworthy.flavor: "If I am to die, let it be a hero's death!"

starnheimcourser.name: Starnheim Courser
starnheimcourser.rules_text:
Flying

Artifact and enchantment spells you cast cost 1 less to cast.
starnheimcourser.flavor: Every worthy warrior who arrives in Starnheim is gifted a mount befitting their heroism, a mighty pegasus raised and trained by the valkyries.

invokethedivine.name: Invoke the Divine
invokethedivine.rules_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.
invokethedivine.flavor: "Let's see how brave you really are behind all that oak and steel."

battlefieldraptor.name: Battlefield Raptor
battlefieldraptor.flavor: It wheeled upward, away from the shrieks and thunder. It reached the point where sky met smoke, and, with but a glance at the horizon, aimed itself and dove.

storyseeker.name: Story Seeker
storyseeker.flavor: Dwarven skalds are the most renowned storytellers in all of Kaldheim. They travel across the realms, seeking out heroic deeds and chronicling them in epic sagas.

warhornblast.name: Warhorn Blast
warhornblast.rules_text:
Creatures you control gain +2/+1 until end of turn.

Foretell 2W (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

masterskald.name: Master Skald
masterskald.rules_text: When Master Skald enters the battlefield, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
masterskald.flavor: "All my scars have stories to tell."

goldmawchampion.name: Goldmaw Champion
goldmawchampion.rules_text: Boast - 1W: Tap target creature. (Activate this ability only if this creature attack this turn and only once each turn.)
goldmawchampion.flavor: "That was nothing. I once took down a frost giant with a spoon!"

axgardbraggart.name: Axgard Braggart
axgardbraggart.rules_text: Boast - 2W: Untap Axgard Braggart. Put a +1/+1 counter on it. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
axgardbraggart.flavor: "Heavy? Ha! The Trollking of Mossrun was heavy, and I tossed him five miles!"

beskirshieldmate.name: Beskir Shieldmate
beskirshieldmate.rules_text: When Beskir Shieldmate dies, create a 1/1 white Human Warrior creature token.
beskirshieldmate.flavor: "If we fall today, let us fall with honor, defending our realm from the horrors that would defile it. Forward, shieldmates! To Starnheim!"

stalwartvalkyrie.name: Stalwart Valkyrie
stalwartvalkyrie.rules_text:
You may pay 1W and exile a creature card from your graveyard rather than pay this spell's mana cost.

Flying

revitalize.name: Revitalize
revitalize.rules_text:
You gain 3 life.

Draw a card.
revitalize.flavor: Esika alone knows how to distill the essence of the World Tree into the Cosmos Elixir, a magical substance which grants the Skoti god-family immortality.

wingsofthecosmos.name: Wings of the Cosmos
wingsofthecosmos.rules_text: Target creature gets +1/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. Untap it.
wingsofthecosmos.flavor: The wolf's startled yelp changed quickly to a howl of elation as she soared over her envious packmates.

codespellcleric.name: Codespell Cleric
codespellcleric.rules_text:
Vigilance

When Codespell CLeric enters the battlefield, if it was the second spell you cast this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
codespellcleric.flavor: "Today we are not Beskir or Tuskeri. We must fight as one clan, shoulder to shoulder, to defend our rightful home!"

giantox.name: Giant Ox
giantox.rules_text: Giant Ox crews Vehicles using its toughness rather than its power.
giantox.flavor:
"How strong is he? Well, I once lost control of the plow, and he carved a furrow right through my house! Didn't even slow down."
-Guldir, Beskir farmer

boundingold.name: Bound in Gold
boundingold.rules_text:
Enchant permanent

Enchanted permanent can't attack, block, or crew Vehicles, and its activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

godshallguardian.name: Gods' Hall Guardian
godshallguardian.rules_text:
Vigilance

Foretell 3W (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
godshallguardian.flavor: Not a single rat has been seen in Istfell since the gods moved in.

doomskaroracle.name: Doomskar Oracle
doomskaroracle.rules_text:
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, you gain 2 life.

Fortell W (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
doomskaroracle.flavor: "Giants and monsters loom on the horizon, and the elves plan to murder our gold!"

ironverdict.name: Iron Verdict
ironverdict.rules_text:
Iron Verdict deals 5 damage to target tapped creature.

Foretell W (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
ironverdict.artist: "You'll raid nothing but mist in Istfell."

alrundsepiphany.name: Alrund's Epiphany
alrundsepiphany.rules_text:
Create two 1/1 blue Bird creature tokens with flying. Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Alrund's Epiphany.

Foretell 4UU (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

orvartheallform.name: Orvar, the All-Form
orvartheallform.rules_text:
Changeling

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, if it targets one or more other permanents you control, create a token that's a copy of one of those permanents.

When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard this card, create a token that's a copy of target permanent.

icebreakerkraken.name: Icebreaker Kraken
icebreakerkraken.rules_text:
This spell costs 1 less to cast for each snow land you control.

When Icebreaker Kraken enters the battlefield, artifacts and creatures target opponent controls don't untap during that player's untap step.

Return three snow lands you control to their owner's hand: return Icebreaker Kraken to its owner's hand.

ascendantspirit.name: Ascendant Spirit
ascendantspirit.rules_text:
❄❄: Ascendant Spirit becomes a Spirit Warrior with base power and toughness 2/3.

❄❄❄: If Ascendant Spirit is a Warrior, put a flying counter on it and it becomes a Spirit Warrior Angel with base power and toughness 4/4.

❄❄❄❄: If Ascendant Spirit is an Angel, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card."

gravenlore.name: Graven lore
gravenlore.rules_text: Scry X, where X is the amount of ❄ spent to cast this spell, then draw three cards. (❄ is mana from a snow source.)
gravenlore.flavor: The runes glow beneath the snow, bearing memories of a time when old gods ruled the realms.

cyclonesummoner.name: Cyclone Summoner
cyclonesummoner.rules_text: When Cyclone Summoner enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, return all permanents to their owners' hand except for Giants, Wizards, and lands.

cosmoscharger.name: Cosmos Charger
cosmoscharger.rules_text:
Flash

Flying

Forerelling cards from your hand costs 1 less and can be done on any player's turn.

Foretell 2U (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

mysticreflection.name: Mystic Reflection
mysticreflection.rules_text:
Choose target non-legendary creature. The next time one or more creatures or planeswalkers enter the battlefield this turn, they enter as copies of the chosen creature.

Foretell U (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

reflectionsoflittjara.name: Reflections of Littjara
reflectionsoflittjara.rules_text:
As Reflections of Littjara enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen type, copy that spell. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)
reflectionsoflittjara.flavor: The masks float downstream toward the Mirrorlake, where faces arise to wear them.

icebindpillar.name: Icebind Pillar
icebindpillar.rules_text: ❄, T: Tap target artifact or creature. (❄ can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
icebindpillar.flavor:
"Oh Valki. I'm disappointed in you. How could the god of lies be so gullible?"
-Tibalt

frostaugur.name: Frost Augur
frostaugur.rules_text: ❄, T: Look at the top of your library. If it's a snow card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. (❄ can be paid wiht one mana from a snow source.)
frostaugur.flavor: From the barest crack in the ice, she teases forth a swirling, living map of the Cosmos.

runeofflight.name: Rune of Flight
runeofflight.rules_text:
Enchant permanent
	When Rune of Flight enters the battlefield, draw a card.
	As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it has flying.
	As long as enchanted permanent is an Equipment, it has "Equipped creature has flying."

avalanchecaller.name: Avalanche Caller
avalanchecaller.rules_text: 2: Target snow land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with hexproof and haste until end of turn. It's still a land. (A creature with hexproof can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

frostpyrearcanist.name: Frostpyre Arcanist
frostpyrearcanist.rules_text:
This spell costs 1 less to cast if you control a Giant or a Wizard.

When Frostpyre Arcanist enters the battlefield, search your library for an instant or sorcery card with the same name as a card in your graveyard, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

giantsamulet.name: Giant's Amulet
giantsamulet.rules_text:
When Giant's Amulet enters the battlefield, you may pay 3U. If you do, create a 4/4 blue Giant Wizard creature token, then attach Giant's Amulet to it.

Equipped creature gets +0/+1 and has "This creature has hexproof as long as it's untapped." (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Equip 2

ingaruneeyes.name: Inga Rune-Eyes
ingaruneeyes.rules_text:
When Inga Rune-Eyes enters the battlefield, scry 3.

When Inga Rune-Eyes dies, draw three cards if three or more creatures died this turn.
ingaruneeyes.flavor: Every path ever charted by an Omenseeker is etched into her eyes.

sawitcoming.name: Saw It Coming
sawitcoming.rules_text:
Counter target spell.

Foretell 1U (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

glimpsethecosmos.name: Glimpse the Cosmos
glimpsethecosmos.rules_text:
Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

As long as you control a Giant, you may cast Glimpse the Cosmos from your graveyard by paying U rather than paying its mana cost. If you cast Glimpse the Cosmos this way and it would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

bindthemonster.name: Bind the Monster
bindthemonster.rules_text:
Enchant creature

When Bind the Monster enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. It deals damage equal to its power.

Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
bindthemonster.flavor: Sarulf's snarl of rage shook the World Tree.

departtherealm.name: Depart the Realm
departtherealm.rules_text:
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

Foretell U (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
departtherealm.flavor: "My home calls to me. I must go."

mistwalker.name: Mistwalker
mistwalker.rules_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

Flying

1U: Mistwalker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

mistsoflittjara.name: Mists of Littjara
mistsoflittjara.rules_text:
Flash

Enchant creature or Vehicle
Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.
mistsoflittjara.flavor: The Skelle raiders boasted that nothing could stop them, certainly not a bit of fog.

brinebarrowintruder.name: Brinebarrow Intruder
brinebarrowintruder.rules_text:
Flash

When Brinebarrow Intruder enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls get -2/-0 until end of turn.
brinebarrowintruder.flavor: Locked in the ice of Karfell, the treasures of ancient nobles await in ruins guarded by the dead.

disdainfulstroke.name: Disdainful Stroke
disdainfulstroke.rules_text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 4 or greater.
disdainfulstroke.flavor:
"The skald boasted that he could outsing the sea. Cosima heard him, and drowned his village with a single wave."
-Longbeard Saga

draugrthoughtthief.name: Draugr Thought-Thief
draugrthoughtthief.rules_text: When Draugr Thought-Thief enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card into their graveyard.
draugrthoughtthief.flavor: The worst part is that you won't even remember how much he's taken from you.

strategicplanning.name: Strategic Planning
strategicplanning.rules_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
strategicplanning.flavor: Alrund sees the future as a whirl of signs and symbols, omens interwoven in an intricate knotwork only he can decipher.

frostpeakyeti.name: Frostpeak Yeti
frostpeakyeti.rules_text: 1❄: Frostpeak Yeti can't be blocked this turn. (❄ can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
frostpeakyeti.flavor: Some heroes line their coats with yeti fur. More yetis line their bellies with heroes.

bergstrider.name: Berg Strider
bergstrider.rules_text: When Boreal Wanderer enters the battlefield, tap target artifact or creature an opponent controls. If ❄ was used to cast this spell, that creature or artifact doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. (❄ can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)

karfellharbinger.name: Karfell Harbinger
karfellharbinger.rules_text: T: Add U. Spend this mana only to foretell a card or cast an instant or sorcery spell.
karfellharbinger.flavor: "This is a realm of the living. King Narfi's legion is coming to change that."

pilferinghawk.name: Pilfering Hawk
pilferinghawk.rules_text:
Flying

❄, T: Draw a card, then discard a card. (❄ can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
pilferinghawk.flavor:
"Well, at least it left us a mouse in exchange. Er...ush...make that half a mouse."
-Binhald, Beskir veteran

runashore.name: Run Ashore
runashore.rules_text:
Choose one or both -

* The owner of target nonland permanent puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

* Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
runashore.flavor:
"Which one of you slug-brained milkstops forgot to make an offering to Cosima?"
-Jolkur, navigator

littjarakinseekers.name: Littjara Kinseekers
littjarakinseekers.rules_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

When Littjara Kinseekers enters the battlefield, if you control three or more creatures that share a creature type, put a +1/+1 counter on Littjara Kinseekers, then scry 1.
littjarakinseekers.flavor: Like calls to like, and none are forgotten.

annul.name: Annul
annul.rules_text: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.
annul.flavor:
"Many giants have tried to crush me with their hammers. You'll never stop me with that little toy."
-Stigur of the Omenseekers

underseainvader.name: Undersea Invader
underseainvader.rules_text:
Flash

Undersea Invader enters the battlefield tapped.
underseainvader.flavor:
"The currents are strange today, and the fish are fearful. Something's stirring in the depths."
-Rathstaf, Kannah fisherman

ravenform.name: Ravenform
ravenform.rules_text:
Exile target artifact or creature. Its controller creates a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying.

Foretell U (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

auguryraven.name: Augury Raven
auguryraven.rules_text:
Flying

Foretell 1U (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
auguryraven.flavor: Some ravens collect shiny baubles; others hoard omens and secrets.

beholdthemultiverse.name: Behold the Multiverse
beholdthemultiverse.rules_text:
Scry 2, then draw two cards.

Foretell 1U (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
beholdthemultiverse.flavor: Countless worlds unfolded before Niko, every one in need of heroes.

hauntingvoyage.name: Haunting Voyage
hauntingvoyage.rules_text:
Choose a creature type. Return up to two creature cards of that type from your graveyard to the battlefield. If this spell was foretold, return all creature cards of that type from your graveyard to the battlefield instead.

Foretell 5BB (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

burningrunedemon.name: Burning-Rune Demon
burningrunedemon.rules_text:
Flying

When Burning-Rune Demon enters the battlefield, you may search your library for exactly two cards not named Burning-Rune Demon that have different names. If you do, reveal those cards. An opponent chooses one of them. Put the chosen card into your hand and the other into your graveyard, then shuffle your library.

eradicatorvalkyrie.name: Eradicator Valkyrie
eradicatorvalkyrie.rules_text:
Flying, lifelink, hexproof from planeswalkers

Boast - 1B, Sacrifice a creature: Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. (Activate this ability only if this creature attack this turn and only once each turn.)

bloodonthesnow.name: Blood on the Snow
bloodonthesnow.rules_text:
Choose one -

* Destroy all creatures.

* Destroy all planeswalkers.

Then return a creature or planeswalker card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the amount of ❄ spent to cast this spell (❄ is mana from a snow source.)

dreamdevourer.name: Dream Devourer
dreamdevourer.rules_text:
Each nonland card in your hand without foretell has foretell. Its foretell cost is equal to its mana cost reduced by 2.

Whenever you foretell a card, Dream Devourer gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cripplingfear.name: Crippling Fear
cripplingfear.rules_text: Choose a creature type. Creature's that aren't of the chosen type get -3/-3 until end of turn.
cripplingfear.flavor: Panic spread like wildfire as the demons of Immersturm poured into Bretagard, slaughtering as they came.

skemfaravenger.name: Skemfar Avenger
skemfaravenger.rules_text: Whenever another nontoken Elf or Berserker you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
skemfaravenger.flavor: Stripped of their divinity, the elves of Skemfar channeled their rage and sorrow into blody brutality.

draugrnecromancer.name: Draugr Necromancer
draugrnecromancer.rules_text:
If a nontoken creature an opponent controls would die, exile that card with an ice counter on it instead.

You may cast spells from among cards in exile your opponents own with ice counters on them, and you may spend mana from snow sources as thought it were mana of any color to cast those spells.

riseofthedreadmarn.name: Rise of the Dread Marn
riseofthedreadmarn.rules_text:
create X 2/2 black Zombie Berserker creature tokens, where X is the number of nontoken creatures that died this turn.

Foretell B (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

varragothbloodskysire.name: Varragoth, Bloodsky Sire
varragothbloodskysire.rules_text:
Deathtouch

Boast - 1B: Target player searches their library for a card, then shuffles their library and puts that card on top of it. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
varragothbloodskysire.flavor: "I waded through a river of fire to bring death to Bretagard."

runeofmortality.name: Rune of Mortality
runeofmortality.rules_text:
Enchant permanent


When Rune of Mortality enters the battlefield, draw a card. 

As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch.

As long as enchanted permanent is an Equipment, it has "Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch."

vengefulreaper.name: Vengeful Reaper
vengefulreaper.rules_text:
Flying, deathtouch, haste

Foretell 1B (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

returnuponthetide.name: Return Upon the Tide
returnuponthetide.rules_text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. if it's an Elf, create two 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens.

Foretell 3B (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

draugrshelm.name: Draugr's Helm
draugrshelm.rules_text:
When Draugr's Helm enters the battlefield, you may pay 2B. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie Berserker create token, then attach Draugr's Helm to it.

Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

Equip 4

poisonthecup.name: Poison the Cup
poisonthecup.rules_text:
Destroy target creature. If this spell was foretold, scry 2.

Foretell 1B (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
poisonthecup.flavor: Dark schemes cut down what armies cannot.

tergridsshadow.name: Tergrid's Shadow
tergridsshadow.rules_text:
Each player sacrifices two creatures.

Foretell 2BB (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a turn later for its foretell cost.)
tergridsshadow.flavor: Tergrid, god of fright, never acknowledges her own shadow...or its murderous deeds.

bloodskyberserker.name: Bloodsky Berserker
bloodskyberserker.rules_text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put two +1/+1 counters on Bloodsky Berserker. It gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

skemfarshadowsage.name: Skemfar Shadowsage
skemfarshadowsage.rules_text:
When Skemfar Shadowsage enters the battlefield, choose one -

* Each opponent loses X life, where X is the greatest number of creatures you control that have a creature type in common.

* You gain X life, where X is the greatest number of creatures you control that have a creature type in common.

hailstormvalkyrie.name: Hailstorm Valkyrie
hailstormvalkyrie.rules_text:
Flying, trample

❄ ❄ : Hailstorm Valkyrie gets +2/+2 until end of turn. (❄ can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
hailstormvalkyrie.flavor: When the path to Starnheim was opened, vengeance rained down upon the enemies of Bretagard.

draugrrecruiter.name: Draugr Recruiter
draugrrecruiter.rules_text: Boast- 3B: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
draugrrecruiter.flavor: "You cannot stand against us, but when you fall, you will stand with us!"

weighdown.name: Weigh Down
weighdown.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card form your graveyard.


Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
weighdown.flavor: The draugr often drown intruders. Years later, their corpses rise from the depths to join the ranks of the Dread Marn.

skullraid.name: Skull Raid
skullraid.rules_text:
Target opponent discards two cards. If fewer than two cards were discarded this way, you draw cards equal to the difference.

Foretell 1B (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

demonicgifts.name: Demonic Gifts
demonicgifts.rules_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield underits owner's control."
demonicgifts.flavor: It began as a flavor on the tongue, like a bloody morsel of roast boar-but soon the power was a conflagration in her veins.

priestofthehauntededge.name: Priest of the Haunted Edge
priestofthehauntededge.rules_text: T, Sacrifice Priest of the Haunted Edge: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of snow lands you control. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

jarloftheforsaken.name: Jarl of the Forsaken
jarloftheforsaken.rules_text:
Flash
When Jarl of the Forsaken enters the battlefield, destroy target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.
	Foretell 1B (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

karfellkennelmaster.name: Karfell Kennel-Master
karfellkennelmaster.rules_text: When Karfell Kennel-Master enters the battlefield, up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)
karfellkennelmaster.flavor: Trapped in a realm of dead flesh and scarce hunting, the ravenous wolves of Karfell follow the Dread Marn to warm game.

dreadrider.name: Dread Rider
dreadrider.rules_text: 1B, T, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Target opponent loses 3 life.
dreadrider.flavor:
"What kind of monstrous grave robber leaves the treasures, but takes the bodies?"
-Fjall, Beskir elder

duskwielder.name: Duskwielder
duskwielder.rules_text: Boast - 1: Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

elderfangdisciple.name: Elderfang Disciple
elderfangdisciple.rules_text: When Elderfang Disciple enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
elderfangdisciple.flavor: "One day, the great serpent will rejoin us on Skemfar, and those who've wronged us will taste of our venom."

feedtheserpent.name: Feed the Serpent
feedtheserpent.flavor: He spent the final moments of his existence tumbling down the length of the serpent's jaws, driven mad by the magnitude of the Cosmos.

infernalpet.name: Infernal Pet
infernalpet.rules_text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Infernal Pet and it gains flying until end of turn.
infernalpet.flavor:
"Here, my pet. Another little light for you to snuff out."
-Kzarakh, Immersturm gamekeeper

withercrown.name: Withercrown
withercrown.rules_text:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature has base power 0 and has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life unless you sacrifice this creature."
withercrown.flavor:
"We'll see each other again soon."
-Egon, god of death

doggedpursuit.name: Dogged Pursuit
doggedpursuit.rules_text: At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1ife.
doggedpursuit.flavor: Kaya had stalked countless horrific foes, but never one that killed with such callous precision and twisted creativity.

deathknellberserker.name: Deathknell Berserker
deathknellberserker.rules_text: When Deathknell Berserker dies, if its power was 3 or greater, create a 2/2 black Zombie Berserker token.
deathknellberserker.flavor:
"Sven fell the elf with an arrow through the chest, but moments later, the corpse rose with a sneer to fight again."
-Lobgbeard Saga

grimdraugr.name: Grim Draugr
grimdraugr.rules_text: 1❄: Grim Draugr gets +1/+0 and gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures. ❄ can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
grimdraugr.flavor: She was a ragged shadow of her living form, but she had lost none of her deadly prowess.

komasfaithful.name: Koma's Faithful
komasfaithful.rules_text:
Lifelink

When Koma's Faithful dies, each player mills three cards. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
komasfaithful.flavor: "Great serpent, hear my song! We wait, our faith unshaken, for your glorious return."

raisethedraugr.name: Raise the Draugr
raisethedraugr.rules_text:
Choose one -

* Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

* Return two target creature cards that share a creature type from your graveyard to your hand.
raisethedraugr.flavor: "King Nafri calls. We go to war!"

villagerites.name: Village Rites
villagerites.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.

Draw two cards.
villagerites.flavor: The Skelle raise scorn poles in conquered villages - cursed totems of wood and bone that sap survivors of physical strength and the will to fight back.

quakebringer.name: Quakebringer
quakebringer.rules_text:
Your opponents can't gain life.

At the beginning of your upkeep, Quakebringer deals 2 damage to each opponent. This ability triggers only if Quakebringer is on the battlefield or if Quakebringer is in your graveyard and you control a Giant.

Fortell 2RR

goldspandragon.name: Goldspan Dragon
goldspandragon.rules_text:
Flying, haste

Whenever Goldspan Dragon attacks or becomes the target of a spell, create a Treasure token.

Treasures you control have "T, Sacrifice this artifact: Add two mana of any one color."

tibaltstrickery.name: Tibalt's Trickery
tibaltstrickery.rules_text: Counter target spell. Choose 1, 2, or 3 at random. Its controller mills that many cards, then exiles cards from the top of tehir library until they exile a nonland card with a different name than that spell. They may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then they put the exiled cards on the bottom of their library in a random order.

magdabrazenoutlaw.name: Magda, Brazen Outlaw
magdabrazenoutlaw.rules_text:
Other Dwarves you control get +1/+0.

Whenever a Dwarf you control becomes tapped, create a Treasure token.

Sacrifice five Treasures: Search your library for an artifact or Dragon card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

tundrafumarole.name: Tundra Fumarole
tundrafumarole.rules_text: Tundra Fumarole deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Add ◊ for each ❄ spent to cast this spell. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end. (❄ is mana from a snow source.)
tundrafumarole.flavor: The only thing that smells worse than troll is burnt troll.

arnibrokenbrow.name: Arni Brokenbrow
arnibrokenbrow.rules_text:
Haste

Boast - 1: You may change Arni Brokenbrow's base power to 1 plus the greatest power among other creatures you control until end of turn. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

dragonkinberserker.name: Dragonkin Berserker
dragonkinberserker.rules_text:
First strike

Boast abilities you activiate cost 1 less to activate for each Dragon you control.

Boast - 4R: Create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

recklesscrew.name: Reckless Crew
recklesscrew.rules_text: Create X 2/1 red Dwarf Berserker creature tokens, where X is the number of Vehicles you control plus the number of Equipment you control. For each of those tokens, you may attach an Equipment you control to it.

calamitybearer.name: Calamity Bearer
calamitybearer.rules_text: If a Giant source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.
calamitybearer.flavor: He'd ignite the World Tree itself if he could.

frenziedraider.name: Frenzied Raider
frenziedraider.rules_text: Whenever you activate a boast ability, put a +1/+1 counter on Frenzied Raider.
frenziedraider.flavor: "Arrogant maggot. You won't be so proud when I rip out your tongue and drink from your skull!"

doomskartitan.name: Doomskar Titan
doomskartitan.rules_text:
When Doomskar Titan enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.

Foretell 4R (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

runeofspeed.name: Rune of Speed
runeofspeed.rules_text:
Enchant permanent


When Rune of Speed enters the battlefield, draw a card. 

As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +1/+1 and has haste.

As long as enchanted permanent is an Equipment, it has "Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has haste."

fearlessliberator.name: Fearless Liberator
fearlessliberator.rules_text: Boast - 2R: Create a 2/1 red Dwarf Berserker creature token. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
fearlessliberator.flavor: "No one else had the spine for it, so I run right between that giant's legs and hauled poor Valdir back to Axgard!"

provokethetrolls.name: Provoke the Trolls
provokethetrolls.rules_text: Provoke the Trolls deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature is dealt damage this way, it gets +5/+0 until the end of turn.
provokethetrolls.flavor:
"I like burning and pillaging as much as anyone, but sometimes it's just easier to throw a rock and let the trolls do the work."
-Urik, Tuskeri raid leader

dwarvenhammer.name: Dwarven Hammer
dwarvenhammer.rules_text:
When Dwarven Hammer enters the battlefield, you may pay 2. If you do, create a 2/1 red Dwarf Berserker creature token, than attach Dwarven Hammer to it.

Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample.

Equip 3.

basaltravager.name: Basalt Ravager
basaltravager.rules_text: When Basalt Ravager enters the battlefield, it deals X danage to any target, where X is the greatest number of creatures you control that have a creature type in common.

crushtheweak.name: Crush the Weak
crushtheweak.rules_text:
Crush the Weak deals 2 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

Foretell R (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

dualstrike.name: Dual Strike
dualstrike.rules_text:
When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell with converted mana cost 4 or less this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

Foretell R (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a turn later for its foretell cost.)

cravenhulk.name: Craven Hulk
cravenhulk.flavor: Abandoned at birth, the giant was raised by goats. Ironically, it grew up to be the most cautious member of the herd.

shacklesoftreachery.name: Shackles of Treachery
shacklesoftreachery.rules_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gains haste and "Whenever this creature deals damage, destroy target Equipment attached to it."
shacklesoftreachery.flavor: In that instant, Toralf felt only the power of the storm and the need to destroy.

immersturmraider.name: Immersturm Raider
immersturmraider.rules_text: When Immersturm Raider enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
immersturmraider.flavor: The demons took no captives and claimed no spoils; they sought only to destroy.

fearlesspup.name: Fearless Pup
fearlesspup.rules_text:
First strike

Boast - 2R: Fearless pup gets +2/+0 until end of turn. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

vaultrobber.name: Vault Robber
vaultrobber.rules_text: 1, T, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "T, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
vaultrobber.flavor: The dwarves believe works of art should be passed down the generations, not buried with the dead.

dwarvenreinforcements.name: Dwarven Reinforcements
dwarvenreinforcements.rules_text:
Create two 2/1 red Dwarf Berserker creature tokens.

Foretell 1R (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

tuskerifirewalker.name: Tuskeri Firewalker
tuskerifirewalker.rules_text: Boast - 1: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. (Activate this ability only if this creature attack this turn and only once each turn.)
tuskerifirewalker.flavor: "Toralf blessed me with fire. I am worthy of Starnheim!"

breakneckberserker.name: Breakneck Berserker
breakneckberserker.flavor: "Go for the knees! The last giant who tried to get past us got rolled back down the mountain in a dozen pieces."

squash.name: Squash
squash.rules_text:
This spell costs 3 less to cast if you control a Giant.


Squash deals 6 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
squash.flavor: The troll had recently crushed a human in much the same way. Sadly, he expired too quickly to appreciate the irony.

cinderheartgiant.name: Cinderheart Giant
cinderheartgiant.rules_text:
Trample


When Cinderheart Giant dies, it deals 7 damage to a creature an opponent controls chosen at random.
cinderheartgiant.flavor: What fire giants lack in arcane prowess, they make up for with reckless, explosive rage.

demonbolt.name: Demon Bolt
demonbolt.rules_text:
Demon Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

Foretell R (During your turn, you may play 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

runamok.name: Run Amok
runamok.rules_text: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3. and gains trample until end of turn.
runamok.flavor:
"A Tuskeri never shrinks from battle! Quite the opposite in fact."
-Arni Brokenbow

smashingsuccess.name: Smashing Success
smashingsuccess.rules_text: Destroy target artifact or land. If an artifact is destroyed this way, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "T, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
smashingsuccess.flavor:
"Who said there's no profit in destruction?"
-Magda, brazen outlaw

axgardcavalry.name: Axgard Cavalry
axgardcavalry.rules_text: T: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
axgardcavalry.flavor:
Riding the goat
-Dwarven expression meaning "a foolhardy act of bravery"

opentheomenpaths.name: Open the Omenpaths
opentheomenpaths.rules_text:
Choose one -

* Add two mana of any one color and two mana of any other color. Spend this mana only to cast creature or enchantment spells.

* Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

hagimob.name: Hagi Mob
hagimob.rules_text: Boast - 1R: Hagi Mob deals 1 damage to any target. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

tormentorshelm.name: Tormentor's Helm
tormentorshelm.rules_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.

Whenever equipped creature becomes blocked, it deals 1 damage to defending player.

Equip 1 (1: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

seizethespoils.name: Seize the Spoils
seizethespoils.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.

Draw two cards and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "T, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
seizethespoils.flavor: "Grab what you want and burn the rest. Leave nothing behind."

frostbite.name: Frost Bite
frostbite.rules_text: Frost Bite deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If you control three or more snow permanents, it deals 3 damage instead.

battlemammoth.name: Battle Mammoth
battlemammoth.rules_text:
Trample

Whenever a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.

Foretell 2GG (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

tyvarkell.name: Tyvar Kell
tyvarkell.rules_text:
Elves you control have "T: Add B."

[+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target Elf. Untap it. It gains deathtouch until end of turn.

[0]: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

[-6]: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast an Elf spell, it gains haste until end of turn and you draw two cards."

vorinclexmonstrousraider.name: Vorinclex, Monstrous Raider
vorinclexmonstrousraider.rules_text:
Trample, haste

If you would put one or more counters on a permanent or player, put twice that many of each of those kinds of counters on that permanent or player instead.

If an opponent would put one or more counters on a permanent or player, put half that many of each of those kinds of counters on that permanent or player instead, rounded down.

blessingoffrost.name: Blessing of Frost
blessingoffrost.rules_text: Distribute X +1/+1 counters among any number of creatures you control, where X is the amount of ❄ spent to cast this spell. Then draw a card for each creature you control with power 4 or greater. (❄ is mana from a snow source.)
blessingoffrost.flavor: A friend of Jorn is never cold.

esikaschariot.name: Esika's Chariot
esikaschariot.rules_text:
When Esika's Chariot enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 green Cat creature tokens.

Whenever Esika's Chariot attacks, create a token that's a copy of target token you control.

insearchofgreatness.name: In Search of Greatness
insearchofgreatness.rules_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may cast a permanent spell from your hand with converted mana cost equal to 1 plus the highest converted mana cost among other permanents you control without paying its mana cost. If you don't, scry 1.

elvishwarmaster.name: Elvish Warmaster
elvishwarmaster.rules_text:
Whenever one or more other Elves enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn.

5GG: Elves you control get +2/+2 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.

oldgrowthtroll.name: Old-Growth Troll
oldgrowthtroll.rules_text:
Trample 

When Old-Growth Troll dies, if it was a creature, return it to the battlefield. It's an Aura enchantment with enchant Forest you control and "Enchanted Forest has 'Tap: Add GG' and '1, Tap, Sacrifice this land: Create a tapped 4/4 green Troll Warrior creature token with trample.'"

realmwalker.name: Realmwalker
realmwalker.rules_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

As Realmwalker enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

You may look at the top card of your library any time.

You may cast creature spells of the chosen type from the top of your library.

toskibearerofsecrets.name: Toski, Bearer of Secrets
toskibearerofsecrets.rules_text:
This spell can't be countered.

Indestructible

Toski, Bearer of Secrets attacks each combat if able.

Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

runeofmight.name: Rune of Might
runeofmight.rules_text:
Enchant permanent


When Rune of Might enters the battlefield, draw a card. 

As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +1/+1 and has trample.

As long as enchanted permanent is an Equipment, it has "Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has trample."

fynnthefangbearer.name: Fynn, the Fangbearer
fynnthefangbearer.rules_text:
Deathtouch

Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch deals combat damage to a player, that player gets two poison counters. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
fynnthefangbearer.flavor: "Come, Koma, and reclaim what you lost! Or does the great serpent fear a rematch?"

rootlessyew.name: Rootless Yew
rootlessyew.rules_text: When Rootless Yew dies, search your library for a creature card with power or toughness 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
rootlessyew.flavor:
"We are bound to wander this forest forever. Sometimes, I think it wanders with us."
-Ogni, Kannah scout

elvenbow.name: Elven Bow
elvenbow.rules_text:
When Elven Bow enters the battlefield, you may pay 2. If you do, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokenm then attach Elven Bow to it.

Equipped creature gets +1/+2 and has reach.

Equip 3

littjaragladewarden.name: Littjara Glade-Warden
littjaragladewarden.rules_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

2G, T, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
littjaragladewarden.flavor: In every tree, a restless spirit.

borealoutrider.name: Boreal Outrider
borealoutrider.rules_text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, if ❄ of any of that spell's colors was spent to cast it, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. (❄ is mana from a snow source.)

spiritofthealdergard.name: Spirit of the Aldergard
spiritofthealdergard.rules_text:
When Spirit of the Aldergard enters the battlefield, search your library for a snow land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

Spirit of the Aldergard gets +1/+0 for each other snow permanent you control.

blizzardbrawl.name: Blizzard Brawl
blizzardbrawl.rules_text: Choose target creature you control and target creature you dont control. If you control three or more snow permanents, the creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn. Then those creatures fight each other. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

pathtotheworldtree.name: Path to the World Tree
pathtotheworldtree.rules_text:
When Path to the World Tree enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

2WUBRG, Sacrifice Path to the World Tree: You gain 2 life and draw two cards. Target opponent loses 2 life. Path to the World Tree deals 2 damage to up to one creature. You create a 2/2 green Bear creature token.

horizonseeker.name: Horizon Seeker
horizonseeker.rules_text: Boast - 1G: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
horizonseeker.flavor: "A five-day climb? Ha! I'll do it in two."

struggleforskemfar.name: Struggle for Skemfar
struggleforskemfar.rules_text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights up to one target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

Foretell G (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face downn. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

arachnoform.name: Arachnoform
arachnoform.rules_text:
Enchant creature


Enchantment creauture gets +2/+2, has reach, and is every creature type.
arachnoform.flavor: Deep within endless webs of clinging silk, the weaver waits.

ravenouslindwurm.name: Ravenous Lindwurm
ravenouslindwurm.rules_text: When Ravenous Lindwurm enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
ravenouslindwurm.flavor:
"I'm no coward, but I'd sooner tangle with a rampaging Torga troll than a hungry lindwurm!"
-Yegar, Beskir warrior

grizzledoutrider.name: Grizzled Outrider
grizzledoutrider.flavor: "Sure, a horse might be faster. but I like to see a horse take the head clean off a troll in one swipe."

icehidetroll.name: Icehide Troll
icehidetroll.rules_text: ❄❄ : Icehide Troll gets +2/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it. (Damage and effects that say "destroy don't destroy it. ❄ can be paid with one mana from a snow source."
icehidetroll.flavor: A troll's greatest weapon is its ability to emerge unexpectedly from the landscape.

gnottvoldrecluse.name: Gnottvold Recluse
gnottvoldrecluse.flavor: Fed up with webs impeding travelers in other realms, Kolvori banished the giant spiders to Gnottvold, where their webs snare only the occasional rampaging troll.

kingharaldsrevenge.name: King Harald's Revenge
kingharaldsrevenge.rules_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control and gains trample. It must be blocked this turn if able.
kingharaldsrevenge.flavor: "We will destroy the pretenders and reclaim the divinity of the Einir."

jasperasentinel.name: Jaspera Sentinel
jasperasentinel.rules_text:
Reach

T, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.
jasperasentinel.flavor: The arrows of the elven strike as true and deadly as the fangs of the Cosmo Serpent they revere.

elderleafmentor.name: Elderleaf Mentor
elderleafmentor.rules_text: When Elderleaf Mentor enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
elderleafmentor.flavor: "Our ancestors grew complacent in their divinity, allowing their lessers to topple them. Never again."

mammothgrowth.name: Mammoth Growth
mammothgrowth.rules_text:
Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

Foretell G (During your turn, you may pay 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a turn later for its foretell cost.)
mammothgrowth.flavor: Thus the longhall became a flathall.

rootsofwisdom.name: Roots of Wisdom
rootsofwisdom.rules_text: Mill three cards, then return a land card or Elf card from your graveyard to your hand. If you can't, draw a card. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
rootsofwisdom.flavor: Though imprisoned in Jaspera trees, the elvish gods known as the Einir still whisper through the ages.

guardiangladewalker.name: Guardian Gladewalker
guardiangladewalker.rules_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

When Guardian Gladewalker enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
guardiangladewalker.flavor: The raiders' only warning was a whisper floating through the mist: "Trespassers."

sarulfspackmate.name: Sarulf's Packmate
sarulfspackmate.rules_text:
When Sarulf's Packmate enters the battlefield, draw a card.

Foretell 1G (During your turn, you may 2 and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

snakeskinveil.name: Snakeskin Veil
snakeskinveil.rules_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
snakeskinveil.flavor: "Does a serpent roar and chase its prey? No. A serpent waits silently for oblivious prey to draw near."

brokenwings.name: Broken Wings
brokenwings.rules_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
brokenwings.flavor:
"Fynn climbed the highest peak and waited, still and silent, until the falling snow had hidden him entirely. When the great eagle flew past, the hunter's aim was true."
- Saga of the Wisdom Seeker

sculptorofwinter.name: Sculptor of Winter
sculptorofwinter.flavor: "I and my kin remember the old ways. The frost whispers to me in a language too ancient for the Skoti usurpers to comprehend."

glitteringfrost.name: Glittering Frost
glitteringfrost.rules_text:
Enchant land

Enchanted land is snow.

Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.
glitteringfrost.flavor: At last, the storm's rage subsided, leaving silent, frozen beauty in its wake.

maskedvandal.name: Masked Vandal
maskedvandal.rules_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

When Masked Vandal enters the battlefield, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, exile target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

kayatheinexorable.name: Kaya the Inexorable
kayatheinexorable.rules_text:
[+1]: Put a ghostform counter on up to one target nontoken creature. It gains "When this creature dies or is put into exile, return it to its owner's hand and create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying."

[-3]: Exile target nonland permanent.

[-7]: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may cast a legendary spell from your hand, from your graveyard, or from among cards you own in exile without paying its mana cost."

nikoaris.name: Niko Aris
nikoaris.rules_text:
When Niko Aris enters the battlefield, create X Shard tokens. (They're enchantments with "2, Sacrifice this enchantment: Scry 1, then draw a card.")

[+1]: Up to one target creature you control can't be blocked this turn. Whenever that creature deals damage this turn, return it to its owner's hand.

[-1]: Niko Aris deals 2 damage to target tapped creature for each card you've drawn this turn.

[-1]: Create a Shard token.

komacosmosserpent.name: Koma, Cosmos Serpent
komacosmosserpent.rules_text:
This spell can't be countered.

At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 3/3 blue Serpent creature token named Koma's Coil.

Sacrifice another Serpent: Choose one -

* Tap target permanent. Its activated abilities can't be activated this turn.

* Koma, Cosmos Serpent gains indestructible until end of turn.

theravenswarning.name: The Raven's Warning
theravenswarning.rules_text:
(As this saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I: Create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying. You gain 2 life.

II: Whenever one or more creatures you control with flying deal combat damage to a player this turn, look at that player's hand and draw a card.


III: You may put a card you own from outside the game on top of your library.

kingnarfisbetrayal.name: King Narfi's Betrayal
kingnarfisbetrayal.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

[1]: Each player mills four cards. Then you may exile a creature or planeswalker card from each graveyard.

[2] & [3]: Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among the cards exiled with King Narfi's Betrayal and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.

thebloodskymassacre.name: The Bloodsky Massacre
thebloodskymassacre.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I: Create a 2/3 red Demon Berserker creature token with menace.

II: Whenever a Berserker attacks this turn, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

III: Add R for each Berserker you control. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

wakingthetrolls.name: Waking the Trolls
wakingthetrolls.rules_text:
(As this Sage enters and after you draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) 

I: Destroy target land.

II: Put target land card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

III: Choose target opponent. If they control fewer lands than you, create a number of 4/4green Troll Warrior creature tokens with trample equal to the difference.

battleforbretagard.name: Battle for Bretagard
battleforbretagard.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I: Create a 1/1 white Human Warrior creature token.

II: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

III: Choose any number of artifact tokens and/or creature tokens you control with different names. For each of them, create a token that's a copy of it.

firjasretribution.name: Firja's Retribution
firjasretribution.rules_text:
(As this Sage enters and after you draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I: Create a 4/4 white Angel Warrior creature token with flying and vigilance.

II: Until the end of turn, Angels you control gain "T: Destroy target creature with power less than this creature's power."

III: Angels you control gain double strike until end of turn.

battleoffrostandfire.name: Battle of Frost and Fire
battleoffrostandfire.rules_text:
(As this Sage enters and after you draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I: Battle of Frost and Fire deals 4 damage to each non-Giant creature and each planeswalker.

II: Scry 3.

III: Whenever you cast a spell with converted mana cost 5 or greater this turn, draw two cards, then discard a card.

haraldunitestheelves.name: Harald Unites the Elves
haraldunitestheelves.rules_text:
(As this Sage enters and after you draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) 

I: Mill three cards. You may put an Elf or Tyvar card from your graveyard onto the battlefield.

II: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Elf you control.

III: Whenever an Elf you control attacks this turn, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

showdownoftheskalds.name: Showdown of the Skalds
showdownoftheskalds.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I. Exile the top four cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

II. & III. Whenever you cast a spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

thebearsoflittjara.name: The Bears of Littjara
thebearsoflittjara.rules_text:
(As this Sage enters and after you draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I: Create a 2/2 blue Shapeshifter creature token with changeling.

II: Any number of target Shapeshifter creatures you control have base power and toughness 4/4.

III: Choose up to one target creature or planeswalker. Each creature with power 4 or greater you control deals damage equal to its power to that permanent.

immersturmpredator.name: Immerstrurm Predator
immersturmpredator.rules_text:
Flying

Whenever Immerstrurm Predator becomes tapped, exile up to one target card from a graveyard and put a +1/+1 counter on Immerstrurm Predator.

Sacrifice another creature: Immerstrurm Predator gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

sarulfrealmeater.name: Sarulf, Realm Eater
sarulfrealmeater.rules_text:
Whenever a permanent an opponent controls is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Sarulf, Realm Eater.

At the beginning of your upkeep, if Sarulf has one or more +1/+1 counters on it, you may remove all of them. If you do, exile each other nonland permanent with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of counters removed this way.

nikodefiesdestiny.name: Niko Defies Destiny
nikodefiesdestiny.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I - You gain 2 life for each foretold card you own in exile.

II - Add WU. Spend this mana only to foretell cards or cast spells that have foretell.

III - Return target card with foretell from your graveyard to your hand.

thetrickstergodsheist.name: The Trickster-God's Heist
thetrickstergodsheist.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I: You may exchange control of two target creatures.

II: You may exchange control of two target nonbasic, noncreature permanents that share a card type.

III: Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

kardursviciousreturn.name: Kardur's Vicious Return
kardursviciousreturn.rules_text:
I: You may sacrifice a creature. When you do, Kardur's Vicious Return deals 3 damage to any target.

II: Each player discards a card.

III: Return target card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a +1/+1 counter on it. It gains haste until your next turn.

arnislaysthetroll.name: Arni Slays the Troll
arnislaysthetroll.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I: Target creature you control fights up to one target creature you don't control.

II: Add R. Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature you control.


III: You gain life equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.

falloftheimposter.name: Fall of the Imposter
falloftheimposter.rules_text:
(As this Saga and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) 


I & II:
Put a +1/+1 Counter on up to one target creature.

III: Exile a creature with the greatest power among creatures target opponent controls.

ascentoftheworthy.name: Ascent of the Worthy
ascentoftheworthy.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

I & II - Choose a creature you control, Until your next turn, all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control is dealt to that creature instead.

III - Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a flying counter on it. That creature is an Angel Warrior in addition to its other types.

invasionofthegiants.name: Invasion of the Giants
invasionofthegiants.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

II: Search your library for a Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

III: Creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn.

(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

thethreeseasons.rules_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

youthfulvalkyrie.name: Youthful Valkyrie

Flying

elderfangritualist.name: Elderfang Ritualist

renegadereaper.name: Renegade Reaper

bonesplittersliver.name: Bonesplitter Sliver
bonesplittersliver.flavor: As the time streams grew more and more unstable, Dominaria's creatures struggled to adapt. The intense pressures led to many dead ends but also to lethal new forms that appeared as suddenly as the ashen rains.

ancientgrudge.name: Ancient Grudge

Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

Grapeshot deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

"The day is mine! I sent three such creatures against my foe, then watched as my magefire popped her soldiers like overripe spleenfruits."

-Dobruk the Unstable, pyromancer

moggwarmarshal.name: Mogg War Marshal

bruteforce.name: Brute Force

needlepeakspider.name: Needlepeak Spider

-Aznaph, greenseeker

- Tefer

hypergenesis.name: Hypergenesis

Suspend 3-1GG

Starting with you, each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield. Repeat this process until no one puts a card onto the battlefield.

tarmogoyf.name: Tarmogoyf

summonerspact.name: Summoner's Pact

Search your library for a green creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay 2GG. If you don't, you lose the game.

fungussliver.flavor:
"When a sliver of this breed enters the hive, the others claw each other in frenzied fits, thereby ensuring their rapid growth."

harmonize.name: harmonize

"Life's greatest lessons don't come from focus or concentration. They come from breathing and simply noticing."

reflexsliver.name: Reflex Sliver

"This sliver comes into the world a perfect predator. It's ready to hunt and devour its first meal within seconds of hatching."

-Rukarumel, field journal

Target creatures gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

thornwealdarcher.name: Thornweald Archer

Whenever Radha, Heir to Keld attacks, you may add RR.

(At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from that card. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)

harmonicsliver.name: Harmonic Sliver
harmonicsliver.rules_text: All Slivers have "When this permanent enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or enchantment."

"Since the last sliver arrived, even our mightiest relics splinter into shards as soon as we bring them against the hive."

All Sliver creatures have defender.

"They are here, and they are hungry. And what they do not eat, they burn. Yavimaya is lost. We must leave now for Skyshroud."
