chromaticstar.flavor:
"This item is not from.. now. It reflects a sky no longer ours and gleams with hope that does not exist."
-Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

jhoirastimebug.name: Jhoira's Timebug
jhoirastimebug.rules_text: T: Choose target permanent you control or suspended card you own. If that permanent or card has a time counter on it, you may remove a time counter from it or put another time counter on it.

gemstonecaverns.name: Gemstone Caverns
gemstonecaverns.rules_text:
If Gemstone Caverns is in your opening hand and you're not playing first, you may begin the game with Gemstone Caverns on the battlefield with a luck counter on it. If you do, exile a card from your hand.


T: Add ◊. If Gemstone Caverns has a luck counter on it, instead add one mana of any color.

vesuva.name: Vesuva
vesuva.rules_text: You may have Vesuva enter the battlefield tapped as a copy of any land on the battlefield.
vesuva.flavor: It is everywhere you've ever been.

urborgtombofyawgmoth.name: Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth
urborgtombofyawgmoth.rules_text: Each land is a swamp in addition to its other land types.
urborgtombofyawgmoth.flavor:
"Yawgmoth's corpse is a wound in the universe. His foul blood seeps out, infecting the land with his final curse."

- Lord Windgrace

swarmyard.name: Swarmyard
swarmyard.rules_text:
T: Add ◊.

T: Regenerate target Insect, Rat, Spider, or Squirrel. (The next time it would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)
swarmyard.flavor: Where scavengers next in hollowed-out rib cages and chittering peer from empty eye sockets, few dare to trespass.

kherkeep.name: Kher Keep
kherkeep.rules_text:
T: Add ◊.

1R, T: Create a 0/1 red Kobold creature token named Kobolds of Kher Keep.
kherkeep.flavor:
"They're still here?! The cockroach may have finally met its match."
-Teferi

flagstonesoftrokair.name: Flagstones of Trokair
flagstonesoftrokair.rules_text:
T: Add W to your mana pool. 
   
   
When Flagstones of Trokair is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flagstonesoftrokair.flavor: Dust-spiked winds eroded the stones, but the ground where they had stood still holds power.

dryadarbor.name: Dryad Arbor
dryadarbor.rules_text: (Dryad Arbor isn't a spell, it's affected by summoning sickness, and it has "T: Add G.")
dryadarbor.flavor:
"Touch no tree, break no branch, and speak only the question you wish answered."

-Von Yomm, elder druid, to her initiates

tolariawest.name: Tolaria West
tolariawest.rules_text:
Tolaria West enters the battlefield tapped.


T: Add U.
Transmute 1UU (1UU, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with converted mana cost 0, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

urzasfactory.name: Urza'a Factory
urzasfactory.rules_text:
T: Add ◊.

7, T: Create a 2/2 colorless Assembly-Worker artifact creature token.
urzasfactory.flavor:
"Though their ideals are leagues apart, Urza's and Mishra's creations have a surprising harmony with one another."
-Tocasia journal entry

calciformpools.name: Calciform Pools
calciformpools.rules_text:
T: Add ◊.


1, T: Put a storage counter on Calciform Pools.


1, Remove X storage counters from Calciform Pools: Add X mana in any combination of W, and/ or U.

dreadshipreef.name: Dreadship Reef
dreadshipreef.rules_text:
T: Add ◊.


1, T: Put a storage counter on Dreadship Reef.


1, Remove X storage counters from Dreadship Reef: Add X mana in any combination of U and/or B.

fungalreaches.name: Fungal Reaches
fungalreaches.rules_text:
T: Add ◊.


1, Tap: Put a storage counter on Fungal Reaches.


1, Remove X storage counters from Fungal Reaches: Add X mana in any combination of R and/or G.

moltenslagheap.name: Molten Slagheap
moltenslagheap.rules_text:
T: Add ◊.


1, T: Put a storage counter on Molten Slagheap.


1, Remove X storage counters from Molten Slagheap: Add X mana in any combination of B and/or R.

saltcrustedsteppe.name: Saltcrusted Steppe
saltcrustedsteppe.rules_text:
T: Add ◊.

1, T: Put a storage counter on Saltcrusted Steppe.

1, Remove X storage counters from Saltcrusted Steppe: Add X mana in any combination of G and/or W.

terramorphicexpanse.name: Terramorphic Expanse
terramorphicexpanse.rules_text: T, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

velomachuslorehold.name: Velomachus Lorehold
velomachuslorehold.rules_text:
Flying, vigilance, haste

Whenever Velomachus Lorehold attacks, look at the top seven cards of your library. You may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to Velomachus Lorehold's

hofrighostforge.name: Hofri Ghostforge
hofrighostforge.rules_text:
Spirits you control have trample and haste.

Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of the creature, except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types and has "When this creature leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to your graveyard."

radiantscrollwielder.name: Radiant Scrollwielder
radiantscrollwielder.rules_text:
Instant and sorcery spells you control have lifelink.


At the beginning of your upkeep, exile an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard. You may cast it this turn. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

bladehistorian.name: Blade Historian
bladehistorian.rules_text: Attacking creatures you control have double strike.
bladehistorian.flavor: "So you see, the reckless battle strategy of the Kathorran orcs was effective, but ultimately proved to be a double-edged sword. As did their double-edged swords."

loreholdcommand.name: Lorehold Command
loreholdcommand.rules_text:
Choose two -

* Create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.

* Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible and haste until end of turn.

* Lorehold Command deals 3 damage to any target. Target player gains 3 life.

* Sacrifice a permanent, then draw two cards.

venerablewarsinger.name: Venerable Warsinger
venerablewarsinger.rules_text:
Vigilance, trample

Whenever Venerable Warsinger deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the amount of damage Venerable Warsinger dealt to that player.

illuminatehistory.name: Illuminate History
illuminatehistory.rules_text: Discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards. Then if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, create a token 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
illuminatehistory.flavor: "Look at the detail in this stonework! Professor, our assumptions about early Kathorran tool use may not be correct."

reducetomemory.name: Reduce to Memory
reducetomemory.rules_text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
reducetomemory.flavor:
"Do not flinch from studying the horrors of the past. History's most important lessons are cloaked in terror and tragedy."
-Augusta, Lorehold dean

reconstructhistory.name: Reconstruct History
reconstructhistory.rules_text:
Return up to one target artifact card, up to one target enchantment card, up to one target instant card, up to one target sorcery card, and up to one target planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.


Exile Reconstruct History.

quintoriusfieldhistorian.name: Quintorius, Field Historian
quintoriusfieldhistorian.rules_text:
Spirits you control get +1/+0. 

Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
quintoriusfieldhistorian.flavor: "Every life has a story to tell. I won't let them be forgetten."

loreholdexcavation.name: Lorehold Excavation
loreholdexcavation.rules_text:
At the beginning of your end step, mill a card. If a land card was milled this way, you gain 1 life. Otherwise, Lorehold Excavation deals 1 damage to each opponent. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

5, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a tapped 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.

returnedpastcaller.name: Returned Pastcaller
returnedpastcaller.rules_text:
Flying

When Returned Pastcaller enters the battlefield, return target Spirit, instant, or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
returnedpastcaller.flavor: Lorehold spirit statues are not forbidden from raising statues of their own.

loreholdapprentice.name: Lorehold Apprentice
loreholdapprentice.rules_text: Magecraft - Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, until end of turn, Spirit creatures you control gain "T, This creature deals 1 damage to each opponent."
loreholdapprentice.flavor: Ancient footfalls echo in her head, their timeless rhythm guiding the present.

ripapart.name: Rip Apart
ripapart.rules_text:
Choose one -

* Rip Apart deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

* Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
ripapart.flavor: Torn from history. Torn from memory. Torn from reality.

makeyourmark.name: Make Your Mark
makeyourmark.rules_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
makeyourmark.flavor: Those who do learn from history may still choose to repeat it.

illustrioushistorian.name: Illustrious Historian
illustrioushistorian.rules_text: 5, Exile Illustrious Historian from your graveyard: Create a tapped 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
illustrioushistorian.flavor: The most distinguished Lorehold professors are eligible to receive extended tenure, even beyond the limits of their own morality.

relicsloth.name: Relic Sloth
relicsloth.rules_text:
Vigilance

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
relicsloth.flavor: When it comes to transporting priceless, delicate artifacts, safety is more important than speed.

thrillingdiscovery.name: Thrilling Discovery
thrillingdiscovery.rules_text: You gain 2 life. Then you may discard two cards. If you do, draw three cards.
thrillingdiscovery.flavor:
"This must be the lost city of Zantafar, where my people lived before becoming nomads. Think of the history we'll learn here!"
-Quintorius, Lorehold mage-student

spiritsummoning.name: Spirit Summoning
spiritsummoning.rules_text: Create a 3/2 red and white spirit creature token.
spiritsummoning.flavor:
"Book are fantastic, but if you're really curious about the distant past, why not ask someone who was there?"
-Augusta, Lorehold dean

loreholdpledgemage.name: Lorehold Pledgemage
loreholdpledgemage.rules_text:
First strike 


Magecraft - Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Lorehold Pledgemage gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
loreholdpledgemage.flavor: "The weight of history can empower you or it can crush you. It's your choice."

stoneboundmentor.name: Stonebound Mentor
stoneboundmentor.rules_text: Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, scry 1.
stoneboundmentor.flavor: Quintorius beamed, his mind eager to absorb every historical fact the spirit wanted to divulge.

furycalmsnarl.name: Furycalm Snarl
furycalmsnarl.rules_text: As Furycalm Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Mountain or Plains card from your hand. If you don't, Furycalm Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
furycalmsnarl.flavor: A seething locus of reverent rage.

loreholdcampus.name: Lorehold Campus
loreholdcampus.rules_text:
Lorehold Campus enters the battlefield tapped.


T: Add R or W.

4, T: Scry 1.
loreholdcampus.flavor: Mage-students obsessed with the secrets of the past choose Lorehold, the college of archaeomancy.

galazethprismari.name: Galazeth Prismari
galazethprismari.rules_text:
Flying

When Galazeth Prismari enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token.

Artifacts you control have "T: Add a mana of any color. Use this mana only to cast instant or sorcery spells."

magmaopus.name: Magma Opus
magmaopus.rules_text:
Magma Opus deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Tap two target permanents. Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token. Draw two cards.

U/R, U/R, Discard Magma Opus: Create a Treasure token.

culminationofstudies.name: Culmination of Studies
culminationofstudies.rules_text: Exile the top X cards of your library. For each land card exiled this way, create a Treasure token. For each blue card exiled this way, draw a card. For each red card exiled this way, Culmination of Studies deals 1 damage to each opponent.
culminationofstudies.flavor: Will's quick thinking meshed with Rowan's raw power to bring down the Blood Avatar.

elementalexpressionist.name: Elemental Expressionist
elementalexpressionist.rules_text: Magecraft - Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, target a creature you control. Until end of turn, it gains "If this creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else" and "When you exile this creature, create a red/blue 4/4 Elemental creature token." (Each instance of that ability triggers separately.)

prismaricommand.name: Prismari Command
prismaricommand.rules_text:
Choose two -

* Prismari Command deals 2 damage to any target.

* Target player draws two cards, then discard two cards.

* Target player creates a Treasure token.

* Destroy target artifact.

multiplechoice.name: Multiple Choice
multiplechoice.rules_text:
If X is 1, scry 1, then draw a card.


If X is 2, you may choose a player. They return a creature they control to its owner's hand.

If X is 3, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.

If X is 4 or more, do all of the above.

roothamercurialartist.name: Rootha, Mercurial Artist
roothamercurialartist.rules_text: 2, Return Rootha, Mercurial Artist to its owner's hand: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.

practicalresearch.name: Practical Research
practicalresearch.rules_text: Draw four cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an instant or sorcery card.
practicalresearch.flavor: The twins each researched spells to defeat Extus in their own way. Will hit the library. Rowan hit everything else.

maelstrommuse.name: Maelstrom Muse
maelstrommuse.rules_text:
Flying

Whenever Maelstrom Muse attacks, the next instant or sorcery you cast this turn costs X less to cast, where X is Maelstrom Muse's power as this ability resolves.
maelstrommuse.flavor: She's an inspiration to everyone, even herself.

creativeoutburst.name: Creative Outburst
creativeoutburst.rules_text:
Creative Outburst deals 5 damage to any target. Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

[U/R][U/R], Discard Creative Outburst: Create a Treasure token.

expressiveiteration.name: Expressive Iteration
expressiveiteration.rules_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, put one at the bottom of your library, and exile one of them. You may play the exiled card this turn.
expressiveiteration.flavor: Prismari students dance in the tension between passion and perfection.

prismariapprentice.name: Prismari Apprentice
prismariapprentice.rules_text: Magecraft - Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Prismari Apprentice can't be blocked this turn. If that spell has mana value 5 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on Prismari Apprentice.
prismariapprentice.flavor: "No one ever created great art by playing it safe!"

stormkilnartist.name: Storm-Kiln Artist
stormkilnartist.rules_text:
Storm-Kiln Artist gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control.

Magecraft - Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, create a Treasure token.
stormkilnartist.flavor: A captured elemental makes for a potent, albeit unstable, power source.

elementalmasterpiece.name: Elemental Masterpiece
elementalmasterpiece.rules_text:
Create two 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature tokens.

[U/R][U/R], Discard Elemental Masterpiece: Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "T, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."
elementalmasterpiece.flavor: Rootha passed with flying, living colors.

teachbyexample.name: Teach by Example
teachbyexample.rules_text: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
teachbyexample.flavor:
"Learning to imitate a master is the first step in becoming one."
-Uvilda, Prismari dean

oggyarbattleseer.name: Oggyar Battle-Seer
oggyarbattleseer.flavor: "May Ganathog bless us with bloody visions of glory restored."

resculpt.name: Resculpt
resculpt.rules_text: Exile target artifact or creature. Its controller creates a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
resculpt.flavor: Critics were struck first by the elemental's surprising grace, and then by its fists.

spectaclemage.name: Spectacle Mage
spectaclemage.rules_text:
Flying


Instant and sorcery spells you cast with mana value 5 or greater cost 1 less to cast.
spectaclemage.flavor: "It would be a crime to withhold my light from the world."

prismaripledgemage.name: Prismari Pledgemage
prismaripledgemage.rules_text:
Defender


Magecraft - Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Prismari Pledgemage can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
prismaripledgemage.flavor: Many have the talent to create, but few have the courage to share their creations.

elementalsummoning.name: Elemental Summoning
elementalsummoning.rules_text: Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
elementalsummoning.flavor:
"You've made a splash. Now show me a torrent."
-Uvilda, Prismari dean

suddenbreakthrough.name: Sudden Breakthrough
suddenbreakthrough.rules_text:
Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. 


Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "T, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

frostboilsnarl.name: Frostboil Snarl
frostboilsnarl.rules_text: As Frostboil Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Island or Mountain card from your hand. If you don't, Frostboil Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
frostboilsnarl.flavor: A smoldering storm of chilling fire.

prismaricampus.name: Prismari Campus
prismaricampus.rules_text:
Prismari Campus enters the battlefield tapped.


T: Add U or R.

4, T: Scry 1.
prismaricampus.flavor: Mage-students who see spellcraft as the highest form of expression choose Prismari, the college of elemental arts.

tanazirquandrix.name: Tanazir Quandrix
tanazirquandrix.rules_text:
Flying, trample

When Tanazir Quandrix enters the battlefield, double the number of +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.

Whenever Tanazir Quandrix attacks, you may have the base power and toughness of other creatures you control become equal to Tanazir Quandrix's power and toughness until end of turn.

bodyofresearch.name: Body of Research
bodyofresearch.rules_text: Create a 0/0 Blue and Green Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it where X is the number of cards in your library.
bodyofresearch.flavor: Needledeep had promised that his final project would be his biggest one yet.

doublemajor.name: Double Major
doublemajor.rules_text: Copy target creature spell you control, except it isn't legendary if the spell is legendary. (A copy of a creature spell becomes a token.)
doublemajor.flavor: "Now I can dedicate myself fully to zoetimancy and void theory!"

manifestationsage.name: Manifestation Sage
manifestationsage.rules_text: When Manifestation Sage enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
manifestationsage.flavor: The first thing a Quandrix mage learns is the laws of metaphysics. The second thing is how to break them.

quandrixcommand.name: Quandrix Command
quandrixcommand.rules_text:
Choose two -

* Return target creature or planeswalker to its owner's hand.

* Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.

* Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.

* Target player shuffles up to three cards from their graveyard into their library.

decisivedenial.name: Decisive Denial
decisivedenial.rules_text:
Choose one -

* Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

* Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays 3.

quandrixcultivator.name: Quandrix Cultivator
quandrixcultivator.rules_text: When Quandrix Cultivator enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Forest or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
quandrixcultivator.flavor: In the gardens spread across the Quandrix campus, fern turns to forest before class is even over.

emergentsequence.name: Emergent Sequence
emergentsequence.rules_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. That land becomes a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature that's still a land. Put a +1/+1 counter on it for each land you had enter the battlefield under your control this turn.

aetherhelix.name: Aether Helix
aetherhelix.rules_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
aetherhelix.flavor: Some Quandrix mages prefer to study at twilight, watching their experimental equations trace glowing trails against the encroaching darkness.

zimonequandrixprodigy.name: Zimone, Quandrix Prodigy
zimonequandrixprodigy.rules_text:
1, T: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

4, T: Draw a card. If you control eight or more lands, draw two cards instead.
zimonequandrixprodigy.flavor: "What are they complaining about? It's not like axiomatic leyline paratrigonometrics is hard."

goldenratio.name: Golden Ratio
goldenratio.rules_text: Draw a card for each different power among creatures you control.
goldenratio.flavor:
"When I look around, I see a world defined by patterns that still manages to defy them."
-Kianne, Quandrix dean

quandrixapprentice.name: Quandrix Apprentice
quandrixapprentice.rules_text: Magecraft - Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a land card from among them and put that card into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
quandrixapprentice.flavor: "The secrets of our world will be mine."

leylineinvocation.name: Leyline Invocation
leylineinvocation.rules_text: Create a 0/0 blue and green Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of lands you control.
leylineinvocation.flavor:
"Do you still believe my work is nothing but dry, boring equations?"
-Cairu, Quandrix mage-student

biomathematician.name: Biomathematician
biomathematician.rules_text: When Biomathematician enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 green and blue Fractacl creature token. Put a +1/+1 counter on each Fractal you control.

serpentinecurve.name: Serpentine Curve
serpentinecurve.rules_text: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractacl creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is one plus the total number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.

squareup.name: Square Up
squareup.rules_text: Target creature has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn.
squareup.flavor: Sometimes the most radical thing you can do is think inside the box.

eurekamoment.name: Eureka Moment
eurekamoment.rules_text: Draw two cards. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
eurekamoment.flavor: "At first, the equations were simply numbers. But in those numbers I saw a story, and in that story I saw a pattern, and suddenly it all fit together!"

needlethorndrake.name: Needlethorn Drake
needlethorndrake.flavor: As they learn to fly, young drakes have a tendency to accidently impale trees, cliffs, and unsuspecting students.

quandrixpledgemage.name: Quandrix Pledgemage
quandrixpledgemage.rules_text: Magecraft - Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Quandrix Pledgemage.
quandrixpledgemage.flavor: "The first step toward transcending physical limitations is discarding assumptions about what is possible."

fractalsummoning.name: Fractal Summoning
fractalsummoning.rules_text: Create a 0/0 blue and green fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it.
fractalsummoning.flavor:
"Fractals are just pseudo-dimensional manifestations of asynchronous biosymmetries. It's really quite simple."
-Kianne, Quandrix dean

vineglimmersnarl.name: Vineglimmer Snarl
vineglimmersnarl.rules_text: As Vineglimmer Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Forest or Island card from your hand. If you don't, Vineglimmer Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
vineglimmersnarl.flavor: A verdant paradox of primal logic.

quandrixcampus.name: Quandrix Campus
quandrixcampus.rules_text:
Quandrix Campus enters the battlefield tapped.


T: Add G or U.

4, T: Scry 1.
quandrixcampus.flavor: Mage-students who see the beauty in patterns and equations choose Quandrix, the college of numeromancy.

shadrixsilverquill.name: Shadrix Silversquall
shadrixsilverquill.rules_text:
Flying, double strike


At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may choose two. Each mode must target a different player.

* Target player creates a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying.

* Target player draws a card and loses 1 life.

* Target player puts a +1/+1 counter on each creature they control.

blotoutthesky.name: Blot Out the Sky
blotoutthesky.rules_text: Create X tapped 2/1 white and black Inkling creature tokens with flying. If X is 6 or more, destroy all noncreature, nonland permanents.
blotoutthesky.flavor: A drop of ink is a nuisance. A torrent of inklings is a menace.

silverquillsilencer.name: Silverquill Silencer
silverquillsilencer.rules_text:
As Silverquill Silencer enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name.

Whenever an opponent casts a spell with the chosen name, they lose 3 life and you draw a card.
silverquillsilencer.flavor: "I am very much in the mood to start handing out expulsions."

dramaticfinale.name: Dramatic Finale
dramaticfinale.rules_text:
Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.


Whenever one or more nontoken creatures you control die, create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying. This ability triggers only once each turn.
dramaticfinale.flavor: The enraptured audience barely noticed their programs were suddenly blank.

silverquillcommand.name: Silverquill Command
silverquillcommand.rules_text:
Choose two -

* Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.

* Return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

* Target player draws a card and loses 1 life.

* Target opponent sacrifices a creature.

vanishingverse.name: Vanishing Verse
vanishingverse.flavor: "Whoever summoned that thing had better confess right this moment, or the whole class will be cleaning the ink receptacles for a month!"

shadewinglaureate.name: Shadewing Laureate
shadewinglaureate.rules_text:
Flying

Whenever another creature you control with flying dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
shadewinglaureate.flavor: "Would you prefer I destroy you using prose or verse?"

killianinkduelist.name: Killian, Ink Duelist
killianinkduelist.rules_text:
Lifelink

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

Spells you cast that target a creature cost 2 less to cast.

T: Untap another target permanent you control.

Exile target creature or planeswalker.

confrontthepast.name: Confront the Past
confrontthepast.rules_text:
Choose one -

* Return target planeswalker card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

* Remove twice X loyalty counters from target planeswalker an opponent controls.
confrontthepast.flavor: "Why, gideon? Of all people, why save me?"

flunk.name: Flunk
flunk.rules_text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is 7 minus the number of cards in that creature's controller's hand.
flunk.flavor:
"I assure you, no one fails my course more than once."
-Embrose, Silverquill dean

brackishtrudge.name: Brackish Trudge
brackishtrudge.rules_text:
Brackish Trudge enters the battlefield tapped.


1B: Return Brackish Trudge from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if you gained life this turn.
brackishtrudge.flavor: Most trudges are covered with decaying plant matter, making them ideal breeding grounds for fungal spores.

necroticfumes.name: Necrotic Fumes
necroticfumes.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature you control.


Exile target creature or planeswalker.
necroticfumes.flavor: When live specimens aren't readily available, Witherbloom mages make creative use of ragged spirits clinging to long-dead bodies.

tenuredinkcaster.name: Tenured Inkcaster
tenuredinkcaster.rules_text:
When Tenured Inkcaster enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and your gain 1 life.
tenuredinkcaster.flavor: "Ah, another future archmage for my collection."

eyetwitch.name: Eyetwitch
eyetwitch.rules_text:
Flying

When Bat Eye dies, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
eyetwitch.flavor: Oculomancers see the ideal potion ingredient. The bats don't see it that way.

magehunter.name: Mage Hunter
magehunter.rules_text: Whenever an opponent casts or copies an instant of sorcery spell, they lose 1 life.
magehunter.flavor: One of the Oriq's most powerful too;s is the mage hunter, a vile monstrosity created to seek out and snuff out the arcane.

goblank.name: Go Blank
goblank.rules_text: Target player discards two cards. Then exile all cards from that player's graveyard.
goblank.flavor: The only feeling worse than not knowing the answer is the certainty you once did.

plumbtheforbidden.name: Plumb the Forbidden
plumbtheforbidden.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice one or more creatures. When you do, copy this spell for each creature sacrificed this way.


You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
plumbtheforbidden.flavor: Stixhaven forbade all magic from the Blood Age, that is where Extus began his research.

specterofthefens.name: Specter of the Fens
specterofthefens.rules_text:
Flying


5B: Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
specterofthefens.flavor: Foul specters hunt down those who try to back out of a deal with a daemogoth.

lashofmalice.name: Lash of  Malice
lashofmalice.rules_text: Target creature gets +2/-2 until end of turn.
lashofmalice.flavor:
"The strongest shadow spells come from disdain for someone else, not frustration with yourself."
-Embrose, Silverquill dean

magehuntersonslaught.name: Mage Hunters' Onslaught
magehuntersonslaught.rules_text:
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

Whenever a creature blocks this turn, its controller loses 1 life.
magehuntersonslaught.flavor: Extus stood before his alma mater for a moment, remembering first his studies, then his vengeance. At his command, the mage hunters unfolded.

leechfanatic.name: Leech Fanatic
leechfanatic.rules_text: As long as it's your turn, Leech Fanatic has lifelink.
leechfanatic.flavor: "Everyone thinks that leeches maintain a strictly sanguivorous diet, but in fact most freshwater leeches are carnivores. Wait, where are you going?"

professorswarning.name: Professsor's Warning
professorswarning.rules_text:
Choose one - 

* Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

* Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
professorswarning.flavor: Professor Onyx urged the twins to prepare for the dark mage Extus, sounding very much like someone familiar with the rise of tyrants.

unwillingingredient.name: Unwilling Ingredient
unwillingingredient.rules_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

2B, Exile Unwilling Ingredient from your graveyard: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
unwillingingredient.flavor:
"Don't look at me like that. It was either this or being eaten by a groff."
-Dina, Witherbloom mage-student

promisingduskmage.name: Promising Duskmage
promisingduskmage.rules_text: When Promising Duskmage dies, if it had a +1/+1 counter on it, draw a card.
promisingduskmage.flavor: "Your technique is sloppy, but there is talent here. Do it again, and keep your right arm in position this time."

novicedissector.name: Novice Dissector
novicedissector.rules_text: 1, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
novicedissector.flavor: "The professor said to first extract the venom glands, then the acid sac. Next up, the ... meeping organ?"

essenceinfusion.name: Essence Infusion
essenceinfusion.rules_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. It gains lifelink until end of turn.
essenceinfusion.flavor: "I'd say it's still a fair fight - now my friend is about the size of your ego."

arrogantpoet.name: Arrogant Poet
arrogantpoet.rules_text: Whenever Arrogant Poet attacks, you may pay 2 life. If you do, it gains flying until end of turn.
arrogantpoet.flavor: "I would be kinder to my peers, Professor, but I simply don't have any."

crushingdisappointment.name: Crushing Disappointment
crushingdisappointment.rules_text: Each player loses 2 life. You draw 2 cards.
crushingdisappointment.flavor: Most students could barely endure Dean Embrose's scrutiny for a semester or two; Killian lived with it his entire life.

cracklewithpower.name: Crackle with Power
cracklewithpower.rules_text: Crackle with Power deals five times X damage to each of up to X targets.
cracklewithpower.flavor: Will gasped as Rowan drew from the raw power of the Strixhaven Snarl. For a moment, she was luminous, transcendent, terrible.

retrieverphoenix.name: Retriever Phoenix
retrieverphoenix.rules_text:
Flying, haste

When Retriever Phoenix enters the battlefield, if you cast it, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

As long as Retriever Phoenix is in your graveyard, if you would learn, you may instead return Retriever Phoenix to the battlefield.

ferventmastery.name: Fervent Mastery
ferventmastery.rules_text:
You may pay 2RR rather than pay this spell's mana cost.

If the 2RR cost was paid, an opponent discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards.

Search your library for up to three cards, put them into your hand, shuffle, then discard three cards at random.

draconicintervention.name: Draconic Intervention
draconicintervention.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile an instant or sorcery from your graveyard.

Draconic Intervention deals X damage to each non-Dragon creature, where X is the exiled card's mana value. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

Exile Draconic Intervention.

conspiracytheorist.name: Conspiracy Theorist
conspiracytheorist.rules_text:
When Conspiracy Theorist attacks, you may pay 1 and discard a card. If you do, draw a card.



When you discard one or more nonland cards, you may exile one of them from your graveyard. If you do, you may cast it this turn.

efreetflamepainter.name: Efreet Flamepainter
efreetflamepainter.rules_text:
Double strike


Whenever Efreet Flamepainter deals combat damage to a player, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

academicdispute.name: Academic Dispute
academicdispute.rules_text:
Target creature blocks this turn if able. You may have it gain reach until end of turn.


Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
academicdispute.flavor: "I'll show you original research, you hack!"

mascotinterception.name: Mascot Interception
mascotinterception.rules_text:
This spell costs 3 less to cast if it targets a creature token.


Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
mascotinterception.flavor: Far from the trappings of royalty, Rowan and Will found inspiration from the most popular sport on campus, Mage Tower.

ardentdustspeaker.name: Ardent Dustspeaker
ardentdustspeaker.rules_text: Whenever Ardent Dustspeaker attacks, you may put an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to the bottom of your library. If you do, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play those cards this turn.
ardentdustspeaker.flavor: "The Founder Dragons weren't even hatched when this scroll was written!"

startfromscratch.name: Start from Scratch
startfromscratch.rules_text:
Choose one -

* Start from Scratch deals 1 damage to any target.

* Destroy target artifact.
startfromscratch.flavor: "I don't care what they think!" Rootha snapped. "I know I can do better."

igneousinspiration.name: Igneous Inspiration
igneousinspiration.rules_text:
Igneous Inspiration deals 3 damage to any target. 


Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
igneousinspiration.flavor: Prismari fosters a burning need to create.

hallmonitor.name: Hall Monitor
hallmonitor.rules_text:
Haste

1R, T: Target creature can't block this turn.
hallmonitor.flavor: "No unauthorized summoning. No writing in the library books. And absolutely no indoor dueling!"

explosivewelcome.name: Explosive Welcome
explosivewelcome.rules_text: Explosive Welcome deals 5 damage to any target and 3 damage to any other target. Add RRR.
explosivewelcome.flavor: Rowan and Will were a natural fit in Prismari College, the school of outrageous elemental arts.

grinningignus.name: Grinning Ignus
grinningignus.rules_text: R, Return Grinning Ignus to its owner's hand: Add ◊◊R. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
grinningignus.flavor: On rare occasions, a Prismari student will summon an elemental that shows such promise that it's permitted to stay and enroll.

fumingeffigy.name: Fuming Effigy
fumingeffigy.rules_text: Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, Fuming Effigy deals 1 damage to each opponent.
fumingeffigy.flavor: Some spirits share ancient wisdon. Others just get mad you touched their stuff.

pigmentstorm.name: Pigment Storm
pigmentstorm.rules_text: Pigment Storm deals 5 damage to target creature. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.

twinscrollshaman.name: Twinscroll Shaman
twinscrollshaman.flavor: "May your wretched name never grace the annals of history, you ignorant buffoon!"

pillardropwarden.name: Pillardrop Warden
pillardropwarden.rules_text:
Reach


2, T, Sacrifice Pillardrop Warden: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.
pillardropwarden.flavor: A giant statue of a dwarf is still a giant statue.

tomeshredder.name: Tome Shredder
tomeshredder.rules_text:
Haste


T, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on Tome Shredder.
tomeshredder.flavor:
"Quintorius, would you care to explain why you didn't complete your homework?"
-Augusta, Lorehold clan

bloodagegeneral.name: Blood Age General
bloodagegeneral.rules_text: T: Attacking Spirits get +1/+0 until end of turn.
bloodagegeneral.flavor: His troops took the Forests of Caerdoon centuries ago, yet he fights on.

dragonsapproach.name: Dragon's Approach
dragonsapproach.rules_text:
Dragon's Approach deals 3 damage to each opponent. You may exile Dragon's Approach and four other cards named Dragon's Approach from your graveyard. If you do, search your library for a Dragon creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

A deck can contain any number of cards named Dragon's Approach.

heateddebate.name: Heated Debate
heateddebate.rules_text:
This spell can't be countered. (This includes by the ward ability.)

Heated Debate deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
heateddebate.flavor: "While you were wasting time with abstract equations, I mastered ancient Oggyar fire magic. Your move."

enthusiasticstudy.name: Enthusiastic Study
enthusiasticstudy.rules_text:
Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
enthusiasticstudy.flavor: "If the pen is mightier than the sword, just think what a giant tome could do!"

firstdayofclass.name: First Day of Class
firstdayofclass.rules_text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it gains haste until end of turn.

Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

ecologicalappreciation.name: Ecological Appreciation
ecologicalappreciation.rules_text: Search your library and graveyard for up to four creature cards with different names that each have mana value X or less and reveal them. An opponent chooses two of those cards. Shuffle the chosen cards into your library and put the rest onto the battlefield. Exile Ecological Appreciation.

gnarledprofessor.name: Gnarled Professor
gnarledprofessor.rules_text:
Trample

When Gnarled Professor enters the battlefield, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

exponentialgrowth.name: Exponential Growth
exponentialgrowth.rules_text: Until end of turn, double target creature's power X times.

basicconjuration.name: Basic Conjuration
basicconjuration.rules_text: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You gain 3 life.
basicconjuration.flavor: "I made that! It's mine! Did you see that?"

accomplishedalchemist.name: Accomplished Alchemist
accomplishedalchemist.rules_text:
T: Add one mana of any color.


T: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
accomplishedalchemist.flavor: "Tincture of murkroot and lizard feet? Simple. One that doesn't taste like murkroot and lizard feet? I'm working on it."

verdantmastery.name: Verdant Mastery
verdantmastery.rules_text:
You may pay 3G rather than pay this spell's mana cost.

Search your library for up to four basic land card and reveal them. Put one of them onto the battlefield tapped under an opponent's control if the 3G cost was paid. Put two of them onto the battlefield tapped under your control and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle.

dragonsguardelite.name: Dragonsguard Elite
dragonsguardelite.rules_text:
Magecraft - Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Dragonsguard Elite.

4GG: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on Dragonsguard Elite.
dragonsguardelite.flavor: "The Founder Dragons brought the Blood Age to an end. It is an honor to serve them."

honortroll.name: Honor Troll
honortroll.rules_text:
Vigilance


If you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 1 instead.

Honor Troll gets +2/+1 as long as you have 25 or more life.
honortroll.flavor: First in his clan to attend Strixhaven, and now first in his class.

overgrownarch.name: Overgrown Arch
overgrownarch.rules_text:
Defender


T: You gain 1 life.

2, Sacrifice Overgrown Arch: Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

devouringtendrils.name: Devouring Tendrils
devouringtendrils.rules_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control. When the permanent you don't control dies this turn, you gain 2 life.
devouringtendrils.flavor: Witherbloom spells often take on the appearance-and personality-of their components.

bookwurm.name: Bookwurm
bookwurm.rules_text:
Trample


When Bookwurm enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life and draw a card.

2G: Put Bookwurm from your graveyard into your library third from the top.
bookwurm.flavor: It takes "devouring a book in one sitting" to a frightening extreme.

karokwrangler.name: Karok Wrangler
karokwrangler.rules_text: Magecraft - Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
karokwrangler.flavor:
"she showed up to class on a what?"
-Valentin, Witherbloom dean

mastersymmetrist.name: Master Symmetrist
mastersymmetrist.rules_text:
Reach

Whenever a creature you control with power equal to its toughness attacks, it gains trample until end of turn.
mastersymmetrist.flavor: Tondo lost his very first duel and has spent his entire life trying to get even.

fortifyingdraught.name: Fortifying Draught
fortifyingdraught.rules_text: You gain 2 life. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
fortifyingdraught.flavor: "If a seedling can push through solid stone, there's no limit to what I could do."

tangletrap.name: Tangletrap
tangletrap.rules_text:
Choose one -

* Tangletrap deals 5 damage to target creature with flying.

* Destroy target artifact.
tangletrap.flavor:
"It's like that old saying: what goes up... feeds the arboretum."
-Lisette, Witherbloom dean

mageduel.name: Mage Duel
mageduel.rules_text:
This spell costs 2 less to cast if you've cast another instant or sorcery spell this turn.


Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. Then it fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
mageduel.flavor: "Remember the rules. No spells to the face!"

recklessamplimancer.name: Reckless Amplimancer
recklessamplimancer.rules_text: 4G: Double Reckless Amplimancer's power and toughness until end of turn.
recklessamplimancer.flavor: "Linear growth? What am I, a first-year?"

springmanecervin.name: Springmane Cervin
springmanecervin.rules_text: When Springmane Cervin enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
springmanecervin.flavor: Cervins feed on the mana-rich plants around the star arches, imbuing their bodies with extraordinary grace and vitality.

spinedkarok.name: Spined Karok
spinedkarok.flavor:
"The bogs are deeper than you realize. Most of the space beneath the surface is taken up by these enormous karoks. You might think your feet are touching the bottom. They're probably not."
-Gyome, Witherbloom chef

scurridcolony.name: Scurrid Colony
scurridcolony.rules_text:
Reach


Scurrid Colony gets +2/+2 as long as you control eight or more lands.
scurridcolony.flavor: Scurrid teeth evolved to crack open nuts, but they work just as well for crushing bones if the nest is threatened.

bayougroff.name: Bayou Groff
bayougroff.rules_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay 3.
bayougroff.flavor:
"Groffs are great for tracking pests through the muck, but securing the pests before the groff devours them is a dicey endeavor."
-Lisette, Witherbloom dean

bigplay.name: Big Play
bigplay.rules_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.
bigplay.flavor:
"Quandrix is running out of time. If they're going to capture the Witherbloom mascot, they need something big here."
-Cremik, Mage Tower commentator

chargethrough.name: Charge Through
chargethrough.rules_text:
Target creature gains trample until end of turn.


Draw a card.
chargethrough.flavor:
"What a move! Lorehold gets caught flat-footed, and WItherbloom barrels ahead."
-Cremik, Mage Tower commentator

fieldtrip.name: Field Trip
fieldtrip.rules_text:
Search your library for a basic Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

kasminaenigmasage.name: Kasmina, Enigma Sage
kasminaenigmasage.rules_text:
Each other planeswalker you control has the loyalty abilities of Kasmina, Enigma Sage.

[+2]: Scry 1.

[-X]: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it.

[-8]: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card that shares a color with this planeswalker, exile that card, then shuffle. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

riseofextus.name: Rise of Extus
riseofextus.rules_text:
Exile target creature. Exile up to one target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard.

Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
riseofextus.flavor: With one lethal strike, Extus took control of the Oriq and took his first step toward vengeance.

mascotexhibition.name: Mascot Exhibition
mascotexhibition.rules_text: Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying, a 3/2 white Spirit creature token, and a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
mascotexhibition.flavor:
"Don't just win the game. Win the crowd."
-Moriana, Mage Tower coach

strixhavenstadium.name: Strixhaven Stadium
strixhavenstadium.rules_text:
T: ◊. Put a point counter on Strixhaven Stadium.



Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, remove a point counter from Strixhaven Stadium. 

Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a point counter on Strixhaven Stadium. Then if it has ten or more point counters on it, remove them all and that player loses the game.

codievociferouscodex.name: Codie, Vociferous Codex
codievociferouscodex.rules_text:
You can't cast permanent spells.

4, T: Add WUBRG. When you cast your next spell this turn, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile an instant or sorcery card with lesser mana value. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put each other card exiled this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

spellsatchel.name: Spell Satchel
spellsatchel.rules_text:
Magecraft - Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a book counter on Spell Satchel.

T, Remove a book counter from Spell Satchel: Add ◊.

3, T, Remove three book counters from Spell Satchel: Draw a card.

teampennant.name: Team Pennet
teampennant.rules_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance and trample.


Equip creature token 1
Equip 3
teampennant.flavor: Choosing a college based on Mage Tower results is discouraged, but not unheard of.

reflectivegolem.name: Reflective Golem
reflectivegolem.rules_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only Reflective Golem, you may pay 2. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
reflectivegolem.flavor: "We don't cut through Sedgemoor anymore. Can't get five steps without a groff trying to fight its own reflection."

biblioplexassistant.name: Biblioplex Assistant
biblioplexassistant.rules_text:
Flying


When Biblioplex Assistant enters the battlefield, put up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library.
biblioplexassistant.flavor:
"I appreciate the help, and honestly, it's very entertaining." 
-Isabough of the Biblioplex

excavatedwall.name: Excavated Wall
excavatedwall.rules_text:
Defender


1, T: Mill a card. (Put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
excavatedwall.flavor:
"Don't be fooled by the quiet. These old stones are trying to talk to you."
-Augusta, Lorehold clan

letterofacceptance.name: Letter of Acceptance
letterofacceptance.rules_text:
T: Add one mana of any color.

2,T, Sacrifice Letter of Acceptance: Draw a card.
letterofacceptance.flavor: The letter unfolded, inviting the twins to Strixhaven. Will saw a chance for arcane study. Rowan saw a chance for power.

cogworkarchivist.name: Cogwork Archivist
cogworkarchivist.rules_text:
Reach 


2, T: Put target card from your graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
cogworkarchivist.flavor:
"It's the largest library in the Multiverse. Of course it has the largest librarians."
-Kasmina

campusguide.name: Campus Guide
campusguide.rules_text: When Campus Guide enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
campusguide.flavor: "There's nowhere in Strixhaven I can't find. Where do you need to go?"

environmentalsciences.name: Environmental Sciences
environmentalsciences.rules_text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You gain 2 life.
environmentalsciences.flavor: First-years quickly learn how the Vastlands earned its name.

introductiontoprophecy.name: Introduction to Prophecy
introductiontoprophecy.flavor: Final grades are posted on the first day of class.

introductiontoannihilation.name: Introduction to Annihilation
introductiontoannihilation.rules_text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller draws a card.
introductiontoannihilation.flavor:
"I've never seen a student fail quite so spectaularly. There's potential in that."
-Hostram, professor of arcanochemistry

expandedanatomy.name: Expanded Anatomy
expandedanatomy.rules_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. It gains vigilance until end of turn.
expandedanatomy.flavor: "Changing the equation from incremental to exponential was a stroke of genius on my part."

thebiblioplex.name: The Bibliplex
thebiblioplex.rules_text:
T: Add ◊. 
2,T: Look at the top card your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you don't put the card into your hand, you may put it in your graveyard. Activate only if you have exactly zero or seven cards in your hand.

halloforacles.name: Hall of Oracles
halloforacles.rules_text:
T: Add ◊.

1, T: Add one mana of any color.

T: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery and only if you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.

accesstunnel.name: Access Tunnel
accesstunnel.rules_text:
T: Add ◊.

3, T: Target creature with power 3 or less can't be blocked this turn.
accesstunnel.flavor: Oriq agents stick to the dark corners of Arcavios, unseen yet ever-present.

archwaycommons.name: Archway Commons
archwaycommons.rules_text:
Archway Commons enters the battlefield tapped.


When Archway Commons enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay 1.

T: Add one mana of any color.

eliminate.name: Eliminate
eliminate.rules_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with converted mana cost 3 or less.

taintedpact.name: Tainted Pact
taintedpact.rules_text: Exile the top card of your library. You may put that card into your hand unless it has the same name as another card exiled this way. Repeat this process until you put a card into your hand or you exile two cards with the same name, whichever comes first.

tezzeretsgambit.name: Tezzeret's Gambit
tezzeretsgambit.rules_text:
([U/2] can be paid with either U or 2 life.)

Draw two cards, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)
